GSP33bbdip11u:5: bhaiṣmīsatyāsametaṃ bahuguṇavapuṣaṃ bhītipūrvāradūraṃ bhaktiśrutyādicintyaṃ bhajanaparagatiṃ bhāvaye veṇukṛṣṇam // 1 //
GSP33bbdip11u:12: yenāyaṃ niraṇāyi madhvagurusadbhāṣyaprakāśāśayaḥ prākhaṇḍi prativādidarśanagaṇaḥ prābandhi gurvarṇavaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:13: śiṣyebhyassamadāyi vittamubhayaṃ prālambhi vidyāsanaṃ so 'yaṃ śrīraghunāthatīrthagururāṭ śuddhiṃ vidadhyānmateḥ // 5 //
GSP33bbdip11u:19: jñeyaṃ gamyaṃ gurūṃścāpi natvā sūtrārtha ucyate //
GSP33bbdip11u:20_1: nikhilajīvajaḍātmakāt prapañcāt paramārthato 'tyantabhinnatayā nikhilaguṇodāratayā nirastasamastadoṣatayā paramapuruṣamavagamayituṃ
GSP33bbdip11u:26: teṣāṃ cārthanirṇayāya brahmasūtrāṇi cakāra bhagavān bādarāyaṇaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:28_1: nirantarāyaparisamāptyādyarthaṃ ca nārāyaṇapraṇāmarūpaṃ maṅgalamācaran śiṣyaśikṣārthaṃ grathayati cikīrṣitaṃ ca pratijānīte
GSP33bbdip11u:36: tathā ca gurūṃśca natvā sāṣṭāṅgaṃ namaskṛtya
GSP33bbdip11u:37: 'sūtrārthaḥ'; samastavedatadupabṛṃhaṇetihāsapurāṇādiśabdarāśyarthabhūto nārāyaṇākhyo brahmasūtrārtho mayā 'ucyate'; bhāṣyata iti yojanā/
GSP33bbdip11u:38_0: atra guṇairudīrṇam ityanena prathamādhyāyasya, doṣavarjitam ityanena dvitīyādhyāyasya, jñeyam ityanena tṛtīyādhyāyasya, gamyam
GSP33bbdip11u:38_1: ityanena caturthādhyāyasya arthaḥ śiṣyahitatayā ādau saṅgṛhīta iti jñātavyam /
GSP33bbdip11u:40: ḍitthādiśabdavatsāṅketikaḥ; kintu arāḥ doṣāḥ tadviruddhāḥ nārāḥ guṇāḥ
GSP33bbdip11u:41: teṣāmāśraya iti vā, arāṇāmāśrayo na bhavatīti vā, viṣayatayā naraviśeṣasambandhijñānāśraya iti vā, aravidhuramuktāśraya iti vā
GSP33bbdip11u:43: tena nārāyaṇa eva śāstrārtha iti pradarśitam /
GSP33bbdip11u:50: natvā guṇairudīrṇaṃ natvā doṣavarjitaṃ natvā'; ityādikā tattvapradīpikoktayojanā draṣṭavyā
GSP33bbdip11u:51: 'gurornāma na gṛhṇīyācchiṣyo bhāryā paterapi'; iti vacanād gurornāma
GSP33bbdip11u:53_0: na ca 'gurūn nārāyaṇaśabdavācyān nārāyaṇapadenaiva gurunāma covāca, āsamantāt viśiṣṭassa eva hi vyāso 'pi'; iti tattvapradīpikāvirodha
GSP33bbdip11u:58: iṣṭadevatāpi sa eveti na tayorbhedaḥ, tathāpi viśeṣānugrahārthaṃ pṛthaṅnatiriti /
GSP33bbdip11u:66: anenaiva ślokena śrotṛpravṛttyaṅgabhūtāḥ śāstrādhikāriviṣayaprayojanasambandhāśca śiṣyaśikṣārthaṃ sūcitā bhavanti/
GSP33bbdip11u:67: dvāpare sarvatra jñāne ākulībhūte tannirṇayāya brahmarudrendrādibhirarthito bhagavānnārāyaṇo vyāsatvenāvatatāra /
GSP33bbdip11u:68: nanu brahmasūtrāṇāṃ prāmāṇye satyeva prekṣāvadupādeyatvam, prāyo 'sya
GSP33bbdip11u:74: dvābhyāṃ yugābhyāṃ parasminnuttarasmin yuge iti vā, vaivasvatamanvantare mahāyugeṣu prathamadvāparāpekṣayāṣṭāviṃśe dharmapādadvayayutatvāt dvāparākhye yuge /
GSP33bbdip11u:75_0: 'sarvatra'; 'manuṣyāṇāṃ ṛṣīṇāṃ devānāṃ ca'; iti tattvapradīpokteḥ 'loka iti sajjano vivakṣitaḥ'; iti prameyadīpokteśca sarveṣāṃ
GSP33bbdip11u:76_0: samyagjñānaṃ saguṇatvādijñānaṃ uta nirguṇatvādijñānamiti vipratipattijanyasandehaviṣayatāṃ nirguṇatvādijñānameva na tvanyaditi
GSP33bbdip11u:76_1: mithyājñānaviṣayatāṃ ca prāpte sati, tajjñānaviṣayībhūtaṃ saguṇatvādikaṃ tattvamanyadveti sandehe tādṛgviparyaye ca satīti
GSP33bbdip11u:78: tasmin saguṇatvādijñāne tasya samyagjñānatvasya niścayārthe, idameva tattvaṃ nānyaditi viṣaye samyaktvaniścayārthamiti yāvat /
GSP33bbdip11u:81: anyapadārthānāṃ devānāṃ brahmarudrendrādibhiriti yadviśeṣaṇaṃ tat prasiddhaprabhāvānāmapi bhagavaditareṣāmaśakyamidaṃ kāryamiti pradarśanārtham /
GSP33bbdip11u:86: tannirṇayāyendrādibhirarthito rudraḥ brahmā ca tataḥ taiḥ sarvairupagamyottamādhikāribhiḥ arthito bhagavāniti buddhyā vivekenānvayaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:87: atheṣṭāniṣṭaprāptiparihārecchūnāṃ tadyogamavijānatāṃ tajjñāpanārthaṃ vedamutsannaṃ vyañjayaṃścaturdhā vyabhajat, caturviṃśatidhaikaśatadhā sahasradhā dvādaśadhā ca /
GSP33bbdip11u:88: tataḥ kiṃ prakṛte ityata āha - atheti /
GSP33bbdip11u:100: 'tataḥ prāgeva vibhaktam'; iti 'punarekaikam'; iti ca śeṣaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:101: tathā ca avāntaravedavibhāgāt prāgeva tataḥ svata eva caturdhā vibhaktāt ṛgādirūpāt mūlavedāt caturdhā vibhaktaṃ vedaṃ ṛṅnigadādirūpamupavedaṃ vyañjayan
GSP33bbdip11u:102: adhyāpanenābhivyajya tatastasmādekaikasmādekaiko bhāga iti caturdhā vyabhajat /
GSP33bbdip11u:103: ṛco ṛca uddhṛtyābhivyajya tato ṛgvedaṃ, nigadādyajurvedam,
GSP33bbdip11u:105: punarekaikaṃ ca vedam ṛgvedādirūpāvāntarabhedaṃ vedam adhyetṛṇāmalpaśaktiṃ vīkṣya caturviṃśatidhā ekaśatadhā ekottaraśatākhyaprakāreṇa sahasradhā dvādaśadhā ca vyabhajadityarthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:107: ṛcaḥ sa ṛca uddhṛtya ṛgvedaṃ kṛtavān prabhuḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:109: ityādinā svata eva caturdhā vibhaktāt mūlavedāt ṛgādirūpopavedamuddhṛtyābhivyajya tasmādavāntaram ṛgvedādi kṛtavānityarthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:110: atra pūrvaṃ dvāparagrahaṇaṃ mahāvedāt uddhṛtasya upavedasya avāntaravedatvena avāntaravedasya ca caturviṃśatyāditvena vibhāgakathanaṃ ca akhilajñānākulībhāvasamarthanārtham /
GSP33bbdip11u:117: eko vedaḥ kṛte hyāsīt tretāyāṃ sa tridhābhavat /
GSP33bbdip11u:118: sa eva pañcadhā jāto dvāparaṃ prāpya vai yugam //
GSP33bbdip11u:119: utsannassa kaliṃ prāpya vedaḥ prāyeṇa sarvaśaḥ //
GSP33bbdip11u:120_0: ityatharvaṇabhāṣyodāhṛtasmṛtau kṛtayuge vedaikatvasya tretāyāṃ traividhyamātrasya dvāpare pañcavidhatvasya cokteḥ, tathā
GSP33bbdip11u:120_1: sarvasyāpi vedasya kalāvevotsādokteḥ, atra tu 'vedamutsannam'; ityanena tretāyuge caturdhā vibhāgasya dvāpara evotsādasya
GSP33bbdip11u:121: tathāpi avyaktamūlarāśyapekṣayā vedaikyokteḥ sambhavāt, tretāyuge prācuryeṇa bhagavadijyāsādhanatvavivakṣayā traividhyoktāvapi vastuta
GSP33bbdip11u:125: bāhulyena sarvaiḥ prakārairvedasya kalāvutsāde 'pi vyāsāvatārātpūrvaṃ dvāpare 'pyapapāṭhādirūpotsādasya sambhavāt avirodhaḥ/
GSP33bbdip11u:129: 'brahmasūtrāṇi'; brahma vedaḥ, tadarthaḥ parabrahma vā, tasya sūtrāṇi tatsvarūpanirṇāyakānītyarthaḥ/ gītābhāṣye tu 'brahmasūtrāṇi cakāra';
GSP33bbdip11u:131: brahmādīnāmarthitvoktyā ca śrotṛdoṣābhāvasya vaktari tannimittavipralambhābhāvasya coktatvāt, 'jñāna ākulībhūte tannirṇayāya';
GSP33bbdip11u:132: ityanena ajñānanirharaṇasya prasaktatvena prasaṅgadoṣābhāvasya tata evānapahāsasya coktatvādāptimūlatā darśitā bhavati/ 'brahmasūtrāṇi';
GSP33bbdip11u:135: tathā ca siddhaṃ brahmasūtrāṇāṃ prāmāṇyamiti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:141: tathā ca - yadasmābhiḥ 'dvāpare'; ityādinoktaṃ tat skāndapurāṇoktameveti
GSP33bbdip11u:143: na kevalamasmābhiḥ kintu skānde coktamiti samuccaye vā 'ca';
GSP33bbdip11u:145: tathoktaṃ tattvapradīpe - 'yadyapyācāryaḥ svoktārthe svayameva pramāṇaṃ, sarvajñatvādavipralambhakatvācca
GSP33bbdip11u:146: tathāpi skānde coktamiti prauḍhavādaṃ karoti'; iti /
GSP33bbdip11u:151: yadvā - utpattyādyaṣṭake jñānasya praviṣṭatvāt tasya nārāyaṇajanyatvopapattiḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:160: 'anyathājātam'; idamado veti pūrvoktasaṃśayaviṣayatām anyadeveti mithyājñānaviṣayatāṃ ca prāptamityarthaḥ
GSP33bbdip11u:162: dvāpare yuge akhilaṃ sarvaviṣayaṃ tadanyathā jātamityanvayaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:166: nanu kālaprayuktamanyathātvaṃ cet dvāparayuge bhāgadvayasyaivānyathātvaṃ yuktaṃ, na tu sarvasyetyato viśeṣakāraṇaṃ cāha - 'gotamasya'; iti /
GSP33bbdip11u:168: śabdaścārthaḥ śāpe viśeṣakāraṇatvasya jñāne vā samyaktvasya dyotakaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:169_0: tathā ca gautamasya ṛṣeḥ śāpācca jñāne guṇapūrṇatvādisamyagjñāne ajñānatāṃ nedaṃ tattvajñānamiti tattvajñānabhinnatvaprakārakapratītiviṣayatāṃ
GSP33bbdip11u:169_1: sandehaviṣayatāṃ ca gate prāpte sati, jñānaviṣaye samyagjñānaviruddhasaṃśayaviparyayaviṣayatāṃ gate satīti yāvat /
GSP33bbdip11u:171_0: ajñānādimiśrajñāninaḥ yadviṣaye jñānaṃ jātaṃ punastadviṣayagataprakāreṣu ajñānasaṃśayādimantaḥ santaḥ 'śaraṇyaṃ'; tatra sādhuṃ
GSP33bbdip11u:171_1: śaraṇeṣu rakṣakeṣu agryam 'anāmayaṃ'; pramāṇalakṣaṇaṭīkoktarītyā atra āmayapadaṃ rogavācakaṃ doṣāntaropalakṣakam /
GSP33bbdip11u:175: taṃ prārthayan svakāryaṃ ca vyajñāpayanniti ca draṣṭavyam /
GSP33bbdip11u:176: atra brahmādibuddhīnāṃ saṅkīrṇatvaṃ nāma saṅkīrṇabuddhiṣu sajjaneṣu dayāyuktatvameva, na tvitareṣāṃ buddhīnāmivājñānādimiśratvam, ajñānasaṃśayādiviṣayaviṣayakatvaṃ vā /
GSP33bbdip11u:180: gautamaśāpāgamaprakārastu ittham - pūrvaṃ hi dvādaśavārṣikyāṃ anāvṛṣṭau satyāṃ tayā pīḍitā ṛṣayo gautamāśramaṃ annavantam adhyūṣuḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:182: atha anāvṛṣṭau śāntāyāṃ teṣāṃ svasvāśramagamanecchā samajani /
GSP33bbdip11u:185: tasminnevāvasare haraśirassthasurasaritaṃ sapatnīṃ matvā tāṃ niścikāsayiṣantyā pārvatyā preṣito vināyako brahmacāriveṣeṇa pracchannastānṛṣīnupasasāra, abravīcca -
GSP33bbdip11u:187_0: cirakālamekaparānnāśanena yuṣmattapo vinaṅkṣyati / tasmāt svaṃsvamāśramaṃ vrajata / tatra ca mayocyamānamupāyamākarṇayata /
GSP33bbdip11u:187_1: yūyaṃ jñānatapobalāt kāñcana māyāmayīṃ māheyīṃ nirmimīdhvam tāṃ gautamatapobalākṛṣṭabalāhakāvalīvigalitasalilavardhitasasyādau
GSP33bbdip11u:188: / atha sasyagrāsinīṃ tāṃ apakrāmayituṃ prayatiṣyate gautamaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:190: tadā brāhmaṇāstaṃ pratibrūta yāvadimāmaśeṣamātaraṃ gāṃ notthāpayiṣyati bhavān tāvanna bhojyānnaḥ
GSP33bbdip11u:191: tato haraśirassthadyusaritamavatārya tadvāriṇā abhiṣicya tāmujjīvayatu bhavān ityevamanutāpinaṃ tamabhilapyāpasaratetyuktvā herambo
GSP33bbdip11u:192: 'mbikāṃ jagāma/ atha te vināyakena praṇigaditaṃ prayāṇopāyamupasṛtya anvatiṣṭhan/ tenaivopāyena prātiṣṭhanta /
GSP33bbdip11u:193: tatastāvadgautamaḥ tapasā tryambakamārādhya mandākinīṃ anusamānīya tadvāriṇā surabhimabhiṣiṣeca
GSP33bbdip11u:195: ata eva godāvarīti tasyāḥ saṃjñā samajani /
GSP33bbdip11u:197: aśapacca gautamaḥ yadasmadannanimittajñānabalādete gāṃ niramaṃsta tat jñānamapaitviti /
GSP33bbdip11u:202: śatadhā caikadhā caiva tathaiva ca sahasradhā /
GSP33bbdip11u:204: devaiḥ prārthito bhagavān kimakarodityata āha - 'taiḥ'; iti /
GSP33bbdip11u:209: kṣarākṣaracetanābhyāṃ uttamo 'bhagavān'; nārāyaṇaḥ 'taiḥ'; svaśaraṇāgatiṃ prāptaireva devaiḥ 'vijñāpitakāryaḥ'; san vijñāpitaṃ pratipāditam
GSP33bbdip11u:210: avatārādirūpaṃ kāryaṃ yasya saḥ, rūpeṇa 'mahāyogī'; nāmnā kṛṣṇaḥ 'parāśarāt satyavatyāmavatīrṇaḥ'; ityanvayaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:213: 'hariḥ'; 'bhagavān'; jñānādiguṇaśālī vyāsaḥ 'utsannān'; apapāṭhādinā tirohitān 'vedān'; 'svayameva'; anyopadeśamantareṇa 'ujjahāra'; uccāraṇena vyaktīcakāra /
GSP33bbdip11u:214: tāṃśca prāgeva caturdhā vibhaktān vedān punaḥ 'caturdhā
GSP33bbdip11u:232: arthasyaikatvāttadvivakṣayā tān vedāniti bahuvacananirdiṣṭānāmapi vedānāṃ tasyetyekavacanena nirdeśo nānupapannaḥ, tasyetyasya samudāyaikavacanatvāt /
GSP33bbdip11u:236: 'tṛtīye punareva ca'; ityatra varatrayānantaramiti viśveśatīrthoktyā ca siddham /
GSP33bbdip11u:238: nanu sūtrāntaraireva vedārthanirṇayasambhavātkiṃ brahmasūtrairiti gatārthatāśaṅkāparihārāyāha - 'yeṣām'; iti/ 'sūtratvaṃ';
GSP33bbdip11u:239: sūtraśabdapravṛttinimittaṃ 'añjasā'; mukhyato 'stītyarthaḥ/ asya tāni 'cakāra'; iti pūrveṇa 'evaṃvidhāni'; ityuttareṇa vā anvayaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:242: kiṃ tat sūtratvaṃ yadāñjasyaṃ brahmasūtrāṇāmityata āha - 'alpa'; iti /
GSP33bbdip11u:243: yāvadakṣaratāṃ vinā śrutyarthābhyāṃ vivakṣitārthasiddhirnāsti tadarthapratipādanāya tāvanmātrākṣaramasati niyāmake tato 'dhikākṣararahitam 'alpākṣaram'; /
GSP33bbdip11u:253: tattvapradīpe tu ekaṃ prayojanaṃ pratyapekṣitārthasya kṛtsnasya pratipādikaṃ 'viśvatomukham'; ityuktam /
GSP33bbdip11u:259: ṛgakṣarāvyāptagānabhāgaparipūrakasāmagatastobhākṣarāṇi apaśabdopetatādṛśavākyaṃ ca vyāvartayituṃ krameṇa viśeṣaṇānīti padaprayojanaṃ tattvapradīpoktamanusandheyam /
GSP33bbdip11u:269: tathā ca yato brahmasūtrāṇāṃ mukhyasūtratvamasti ata eva hi 'nirviśeṣitasūtratvaṃ';
GSP33bbdip11u:270: nirgatā viśeṣā yasmāttannirviśeṣaṃ tathākhyātaṃ nirviśeṣitaṃ tādṛśaṃ sūtrapadaṃ yasya tasya bhāvaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:272: sañjātaḥ tādṛśaḥ sūtraśabdo yasya tasya bhāvo nirviśeṣitasūtratvam /
GSP33bbdip11u:275: atrādyapakṣe tathākhyātamityarthe ṇyantātkarmaṇi ktaḥ, dvitīye taddhitaḥ 'itac'; iti vivekaḥ/ anena brahmasūtrāṇāṃ mukhyasūtratve nirviśeṣitaśabdavācyatvāditi heturukto bhavati /
GSP33bbdip11u:276: atra hetoraprayojakatvamāśaṅkya vyāptivacanena tāṃ parihartuṃ tatra prathamaṃ yadyannanirviśeṣitaṃ tattanna mukhyamityanvayavyāptimabhipretya tatra dṛṣṭāntamāha - 'yathā'; iti /
GSP33bbdip11u:279: / tathā ca yathā ekasyaiva sataḥ kṛṣṇasya vedavyāsasya vyāsatvaṃ nirviśeṣitavyāsapadavācyatvamastītyarthaḥ
GSP33bbdip11u:281: idānīṃ ye amukhyāḥ na te nirviśeṣapadavācyāḥ kintu saviśeṣapadavācyāḥ iti vyatirekavyāptimabhipretya tatra dṛṣṭāntamāha - 'anye'; iti /
GSP33bbdip11u:287: tathā ca - yathā kṛṣṇāt 'anye'; drauṇyādayo ye 'mukhyāste
GSP33bbdip11u:289: tṛtīyārthe vā pañcamī, saviśeṣaṇavyāsapadavācyā eveti yojanā /
GSP33bbdip11u:291: nanvastu brahmasūtrāṇāṃ mukhyatvaṃ, tathāpi tadanyeṣāmapyasti, na
GSP33bbdip11u:292_0: teṣāmeva, itareṣāmamukhyatve kāraṇābhāvādityāśaṅkya, tatra nirviśeṣitatvahetoḥ samavyāptipareṇa tadarthameva prāguktavyatirekavyāptidṛṣṭāntavacanenopapāditānvayavyāptikamanumānaṃ
GSP33bbdip11u:303_0: nirviśeṣitatvamukhyatvayoḥ saviśeṣaṇatvāmukhyatvayośca dṛṣṭāntamukhenopapāditāṃ vyāptiṃ dṛṣṭānte mukhyatvāmukhyatvayoḥ vedavibhāgagranthavistarakartṛtvatatsādṛśyādirūpānyakāraṇaprayojyatvasambhavādasiddhā
GSP33bbdip11u:314: 'iti'; evaṃ prakāreṇa 'śabdatattvārthavedinaḥ'; śabdasya yathābhūtārthajñānino 'vedavido'; vedārthajñāḥ vṛddhāḥ 'prāhuḥ';
GSP33bbdip11u:321: tathā ca mukhyāmukhyayornirviśeṣaṇasaviśeṣaṇaśabdavācyatve vedo vṛddhavyavahāraśca pramāṇamityuktatvānna tayoḥ kāraṇāntaraṃ śaṅkyamiti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:324: tathāpi vedārthanirṇayasya sūtrāntaraireva sambhavāt kiṃ brahmasūtrairiti codyasya kathaṃ
GSP33bbdip11u:325: ityanena parihāra ukta ityatastadvākyoktaṃ vivṛṇoti - 'sūtreṣu'; iti /
GSP33bbdip11u:328: nirṇayasya sarvatvaṃ viṣayadvārā tasya ca śabdadvārā bodhyam /
GSP33bbdip11u:329: tathā ca yebhyaḥ sūtrebhyaḥ sarve nirṇayāḥ sarvaśākhārthanirṇayāḥ bhāvyatayā samudīritāḥ,
GSP33bbdip11u:332: ayaṃ bhāvaḥ - 'yeṣām'; iti vākye tāvat brahmasūtrāṇāmevāñjasā sūtratvamityuktam /
GSP33bbdip11u:333: sati caivaṃ tadantargataṃ sūtradharmatayoktaṃ viśvatoṇukhatvamapi teṣāmevāñjasā bhavati /
GSP33bbdip11u:339: tacchabdaghaṭitaṃ tadvacanaṃ tādarthyena sūtrakaraṇavacanamiti bhavati tena śaṅkāparihāra iti /
GSP33bbdip11u:351: śabdajātapadaṃ śabdapramāṇamātraparamityāśayena sambandhaṣaṣṭhīyam, sambandhaśca janyajanakabhāvaḥ iti kecit /
GSP33bbdip11u:359: yathā śrutimūlakasmṛteravaiyarthyaṃ tadvadavaiyarthyopapattermūlena mūlino vaiyarthyābhāvāditi bhāvaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:368: kṣīti kṣayārthasya kṣeḥ rūpaṃ manuṣyottamavācakam, teṣāmitarāpekṣayā atyalpāyuṣṭvāt /
GSP33bbdip11u:378_0: tathā ca puruṣottamo mahāyaśāḥ uttamaśloko bhagavān vyāso yeṣu sūtreṣu sarve nirṇayāḥ samudīritāḥ, yeṣāṃ sarvaśākhānirṇāyakatvamuktam,
GSP33bbdip11u:379_1: - taṃ vinā avāntaratātparyajñānamātreṇa muktiphalāsiddheriti coktaṃ 'yeṣāṃ'; iti pūrvavākye pramāṇe ca - evaṃvidhāni etādṛkprakārāṇi
GSP33bbdip11u:379_2: sūtrāṇi kṛtvā brahmarudrādideveṣu manuṣyapitṛpakṣiṣu jñānaṃ saṃsthāpya krīḍata iti mahāvākyayojanā /
GSP33bbdip11u:382: atra brahmādiṣu jñānasaṃsthāpanaṃ nāma pūrvaṃ sthitasyaiva jñānasya viśeṣayuktyādibhiḥ dṛḍhīkaraṇaṃ kiñcidaprāptalābhaścocyate1, 'jānanto 'pi
GSP33bbdip11u:384: na ca 'evaṃ jñānaṃ punaḥ prāpurdevāśca ṛṣayastathā'; iti
GSP33bbdip11u:385: bhāratatātparyaniraṇayavirodhaḥ, atra punaśśabdātsarvadevādīnāṃ ajñātavismṛtārthajñānaprāpteruktatvāditi vācyam, tasyāpyuktārthatvāt /
GSP33bbdip11u:386: viriñcetareṣāṃ tirohitārthajñānalābho vātrocyate, yata āhurgītātātparye ācāryāḥ - “brahmaṇastu prāyo nāpratibhāsitam”iti /
GSP33bbdip11u:391_0: pramāṇābhāvena jīvacaitanyātiriktabrahmaṇo 'bhāvāt, jīvasya ca svaprakāśatvenāsandigdhatvāt, tathā ca viṣayābhāvāt pratyagrūpe
GSP33bbdip11u:392: eva tatpratibaddhādhikāryabhāvācca na brahmajijñāsā kartavyeti prāpte siddhāntitaṃ bhagavatā sūtrakāreṇa om athāto brahmajijñāsā |
GSP33bbdip11u:413: sāpi ākṣepikī ātideśikī aupodghātikī āpavādikī prāsaṅgikī ityādirūpeṇa bahuvidhā /
GSP33bbdip11u:416: tathā pūrvādhikaraṇatadviṣayasaṅgatī api naitadadhikaraṇasya bhavataḥ, asyaivādyādhikaraṇatvāt
GSP33bbdip11u:418: atra sūtre ādyantayoroṅkāraḥ uccāraṇīyaḥ tatrādya eka eva dṛṣṭādṛṣṭobhayārthaḥ ata eva sūtrāvayavaḥ sarvasūtreṣu anuvṛttyarthamasaṃhitatayoccāryate /
GSP33bbdip11u:421: ante tu pakṣadvaye 'pi adṛṣṭārtha eka evoṅkāraḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:442: granthādau maṅgalācaraṇasyāvaśyaṃ kartavyatvena maṅgalaprayojakatayā athaśabdaṃ vyācaṣṭe - 'atha'; iti /
GSP33bbdip11u:443_1: viṣṇuḥ tadguṇo vābhidheyo yasya sa tathoktaḥ athaśabdasya maṅgalaphalakatvaṃ tu -
GSP33bbdip11u:450: samuccaye, na kevalaṃ maṅgalaprayojakaḥ kintvānantaryābhidhāyakaśceti viṣayasamuccaye vā /
GSP33bbdip11u:459: heturliṅgamartho yasya, hetuḥ kāraṇaṃ prasādākhyamartho yasyeti vā, sa tathoktaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:461_0: nanvathātaḥ śabdapūrvakatvaṃ sūtrāṇāṃ kiṃ nimittaṃ vighnanivartakaśabdoccāraṇādeḥ “maṅgalaṃ tataḥ”iti śabdāntaroccāraṇenāpi
GSP33bbdip11u:464: kevalamasmābhiḥ, kintu gāruḍe ceti samuccaye vā ca śabdaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:474_0: vyāsajaiminyādikṛtāni sarvāṇyapyādisūtrāṇi 'niyatyaiva'; niyamenaiva kalpāntarepi 'athātaśśabdapūrvāṇi'; eva, athātaśśabdau
GSP33bbdip11u:478: nanvavaśyavaktavyārthatvaṃ svarūpottamattvam arthata ādhikyaṃ vā niyāmakaṃ bhaviṣyatītyāśaṅkyādyapakṣe pṛcchati - 'kaśca'; iti /
GSP33bbdip11u:483: tathā ca - 'tayoḥ'; athātaḥśabdayoḥ ko 'sāvavaśyavaktavyo 'rthaḥ yena prāthamyamityarthaḥ
GSP33bbdip11u:492: atra ādyatṛtīyapakṣayoravaśyavaktavyārthatārthādhikyayostadabhāvayośca loke śabdāntareṣu darśanāt athātaśśabdayostatsandehāt praśna eva na tvākṣepaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:493: dvitīyapakṣe tu svarūpādhikyasya śabdāntareṣvadarśanāt ākṣepa eveti dhyeyam /
GSP33bbdip11u:496: etadākhyāhi me brahman yathā jñāsyāmi tattvataḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:506: tathā ca - sautrāthaśabdaḥ 'adhikārasyānantarye'; adhikāranirūpitānantaryarūpārthe tadviṣaye tanmātravācakatvābhiprāyeṇaiva sūtrakāraiḥ 'samudīritaḥ';
GSP33bbdip11u:508: avaśyakartavyaprayojanakatvācca prathamamathaśabdaprayoga iti bhāvenāthaśabdo maṅgalārtha iti svoktārthe pramāṇaṃ darśayati - 'maṅgalārthe'; iti /
GSP33bbdip11u:513: maṅgalarūpaprayojanārthaṃ ca athaśabdaḥ sūtrakāraissamudīritaḥ prayukto bhavedityarthaḥ/ viṣṇuvācakākāraghaṭitāthaśabdoccāraṇarūpamaṅgalasya tatsādhyatvāditi bhāvaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:518: evamathaśabdasya avasyavaktavyārthatvarūpaṃ prathamaprayoganiyāmakaṃ pradarśya ataḥśabdasyāpi taddarśayati - 'ataḥśabdastu hetvarthe'; iti /
GSP33bbdip11u:526: hetāvityanuktvā arthaśabdagrahaṇaṃ śabdādhikyādarthādhikyamiti nyāyena prakṛterheturarthaḥ pratyayasya tu hetutvamartha iti prakṛtipratyayobhayārthakathanārtham /
GSP33bbdip11u:530: parasya brahmaṇo viṣṇoḥ prasādāditi vā bhavet /
GSP33bbdip11u:539: śabdaprakṛtikaṃ tasilantaṃ padam, prakṛtyartho viṣṇuḥ, 'prasādāt'; iti tu labdhārthakathanaṃ, kāraṇatvaṃ pratyayārtha ityuktaṃ bhavati /
GSP33bbdip11u:541: “a iti brahma”(ai.ā.2-3-8-7) iti śrutiṃ sūcayati parabrahmagrahaṇena /
GSP33bbdip11u:546: liṅgatvaṃ, na tathā tadarthaprasādasya, kintu kartavyajijñāsāyāṃ jñānamokṣayorathaśabdārthādhyayanādau ca kāraṇatvenānvaya ityāśayena pṛthaguktiḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:550: nanu jijñāsādyarthaṃ kiṃ bhagavatprasādena yenāsāvavaśyavaktavyārthaḥ syādityata āha - 'sa hi'; iti /
GSP33bbdip11u:551: 'hi'; yasmāt 'saḥ'; viṣṇuprasādaḥ prasanno viṣṇuriti yāvat 'sarvamanovṛttiprerakaḥ'; sarveṣāṃ adhikāriṇāṃ sarvasmin
GSP33bbdip11u:556: evaṃ sarvāsāṃ manovṛttīnāṃ tatprabhedānāṃ ṭīkāsthādipadagṛhītānāṃ jñānādhyayanādīnāṃ manovṛttisādhyamokṣādeśca prerakaḥ sampādakaḥ ityapi vyākhyeyam /
GSP33bbdip11u:560_0: nanu maṅgalācaraṇādeḥ “maṅgalaṃ tataḥ”iti śabdāntareṇāpi sambhavātkimetatprayoganiyatyeti kṛtacodyasya kaḥ parihāra ityato
GSP33bbdip11u:568: svasamānajātīyaśabdāntarotpatteḥ pūrvaṃ oṅkāro 'tha śabdaścetyetau kaṇṭhaṃ bhittvā 'vinissṛtau'; viniryātau, tasmātsvarūpottamau,
GSP33bbdip11u:570: atrākṣepāviṣayasyāpyoṅkārasya svarūpādhikyoktirbrahmamīmāṃsāśāstramātramukhyāmukhyāditvavivakṣayā pravṛttaṃ 'sarva ete'; iti vakṣyamāṇamanusṛtyeti draṣṭavyam /
GSP33bbdip11u:571: nanu dvayorekavidhaṃ prāthamikatvaṃ viruddhamityata uktaṃ 'kramāt'; iti /
GSP33bbdip11u:576: athaśabdasya oṅkāreṇa saha svarūpādhikayamabhidhāya ataḥśabdasyāpi tadāha
GSP33bbdip11u:579: sa coddeśyasamarpakasya ata ityasya śabdaparatvajñāpanadvārā tṛtīyatayoktatvādividhānārthaḥ anyathā svarūpādhikyakathanadaśāsaṅgatiḥ syāt /
GSP33bbdip11u:580: yadyapi purovādānusārāt 'taddhetutvaṃ vadan'; iti suvacam; tathāpi hetuśabdasya liṅgārthatvapakṣe tatsvarūpaṃ vivarituṃ kāraṇārthatvapakṣe
GSP33bbdip11u:593: kintu 'taddhetutvaṃ'; tasya prasannasyākāravācyasya viṣṇostatra jijñāsādau kāraṇatvaṃ tasipratyayena vadanprakṛtyaiva tasya jijñāsādermokṣahetutvarūpaṃ liṅgaṃ vā vadan 'ataḥ';
GSP33bbdip11u:595: tṛtīyatayā 'udāhṛtaḥ'; uccāritaḥ ataḥ so 'pi svarūpottamaḥ ; yata evamato 'taśśabdo 'pi tṛtīyatayā prāthamika udāhṛta iti yojanā /
GSP33bbdip11u:597: maṅgalaśabdena maṅgaloktāvapi tasya svarūpādhikyānukteḥ athātaḥśabdābhyāmivādhikāraprayojanayoranukteśca na tena gatārthatā,
GSP33bbdip11u:600: “maṅgaloktyādeḥ”ityādiśabdaḥ tataśśabdena hetvānantaryapratiyogyadhikārasūcane 'pi na tasyādisūtre niveśā yuktaḥ,
GSP33bbdip11u:603: na kevalamavaśyavaktavyārthatvāt nāpi svarūpādhikyāt athātaśśabdayoḥ prathamaprayogaḥ, kintvavayavārthataśca /
GSP33bbdip11u:604: ato 'pi prathamaprayoga iti bhāvena kathamiti tṛtīyapraśnasya prākarāntareṇottaramāha - 'akāraḥ'; iti
GSP33bbdip11u:612: evaṃ tayoḥ 'tathau'; taśca thaśca varṇau 'prāṇātmakau'; prāṇau, doṣātmakaḥ doṣa itivat /
GSP33bbdip11u:615: “mahataścaturmukhāt”itivat abhimānyabhimanyamānayoḥ, “ayaṃ vai lokaḥ prathamā mahānāmnī”( ) itivadvācyavācakayoḥ sāmānādhikaraṇyena aikyavyapadeśaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:622: tathā ca - tasya akāravācyasya parabrahmaṇo vyāptisthityabhidāyakau ityarthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:625: thakārasya tu avikāreṇa avasthitirartha ityarthabhedo jñātavyaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:626: tattvapradīpe tu - 'tathau prāṇātmakaṃ prāptau'; iti pāṭhabhedamaṅgīkṛtya prāṇātmakaṃ prāṇapraṇetāraṃ viṣṇuṃ vācakatvena prāptāviti vyākhyātam /
GSP33bbdip11u:627: yadyapi sūtre praviṣṭasya sarvanāmaprakṛtikasya ataśśabdasya naivamavayavārthakathanaṃ yujyate, asarvanāmaprakṛtikasya tu 'parasya';
GSP33bbdip11u:629: tathāpi athaśabdasya arthata ādhikyānukteḥ tadgatavarṇayoḥ asarvanāmaprakṛtikātaśśabdagatavarṇayośca vākyārthāpraviṣṭātiśayitārthāntaroktiriyamityadoṣaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:630: ataśca pūrvamuccāryāḥ sarva ete satāṃ matāḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:633: tatra athātaśśabdaviṣaye samuccayaḥ, oṅkāraviṣaye tu svarūpata
GSP33bbdip11u:640: yadvā - 'satāṃ'; mukhyānāṃ brahmasūtrāṇāṃ pūrvaṃ ādisūtre ityarthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:656: ata eva 'ataśca'; iti trayāṇāṃ prakṛtatvepi oṅkāravaiṣamyajñāpanāya athātaśśabdayorevoktiḥ
GSP33bbdip11u:663: athaśabdo 'dhikārānantaryaṃ vaktītyuktaṃ; tatra kosāvadhikāro brahmajijñāsāyāṃ, katividhaśca sa ityata āha - 'adhikāraḥ'; iti /
GSP33bbdip11u:664: caśabdo na kevalamadhikāraḥ kintu tadvibhāgaśca bhāgavatatantrākhyagranthe
GSP33bbdip11u:666: atra pramāṇe adhikārikathane 'pi tadviśeṣaṇatayā devatvādirūpo 'pyadhikāraḥ ukto bhavatīti
GSP33bbdip11u:672: tatra mandā manuṣyeṣu ya uttamagaṇā matāḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:673: 'tatra'; trividheṣu madhye manuṣyeṣu ye uttamagaṇāḥ te mokṣayogyeṣu mandādhikāriṇa ityuddeśyavidheyabhāvo draṣṭavyaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:689: athavā “itiśabdaḥ pratyekaṃ abhisambadhyate, ata eva dvirgrahaṇaṃ”iti
GSP33bbdip11u:693: 'iti'; evaṃ 'jātikṛto'; manuṣyarṣidevatvādirūpasāmānyanimittakaḥ tattatkulajaninimitto vā 'bhedaḥ'; avāntaravibhāgaḥ anyonyābhāvo vā jñeya ityarthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:696: na ca sacchūdrāderviprādidehāntare brahmavidyādhikāritvānnātivyāptiriti vācyam, dehāntare sato 'pi
GSP33bbdip11u:698_0: tathā ca sacchūdrādāvasyādhikārasya prāyikatvādbāhulakatvāt, ata evaitaddehe 'bhāvāt ata evālakṣyatvāt, asya ca mokṣayogyatvasya
GSP33bbdip11u:698_1: svarūpatvenānadhikāraḥ daśāyāmapi sattvādvyāpterdhrauvyādityataḥ prakārāntareṇa adhikāriṇaḥ svarūpamāha - 'tathā'; iti /
GSP33bbdip11u:709: atra - avaiṣṇavasya vede 'pi hyadhikāro na vidyate /
GSP33bbdip11u:720: tathā ca - yo naraḥ parame viṣṇau bhaktimān adhyayanavāṃśca so 'dhamo 'dhikārīti
GSP33bbdip11u:722: yaḥ śamādisaṃyukto naraḥ sa madhyama iti proktaḥ
GSP33bbdip11u:724: yaḥ 'ābrahmastambaparyantaṃ'; caturmukhamārabhya tṛṇajīvaparyantaṃ jīvajātaṃ 'asāraṃ'; asarvottamaṃ, asārapadaṃ mokṣadavaraparaṃ vā
GSP33bbdip11u:726: parabrahma tu sarvasāraṃ sarvathā nityaṃ ceti /
GSP33bbdip11u:729: yaśca tato vivekāt 'jātavairāgyaḥ'; iti vijñāya janitavairāgya iti vā /
GSP33bbdip11u:731: 'viṣṇupādaikasaṃśrayaḥ'; viṣṇupāda eva eko mukhyaḥ saṃśrayo mama
GSP33bbdip11u:734: yaśca 'sannyastākhilakarmavān'; sannyastaṃ bhagavati samarpitaṃ akhilaṃ yadakāmyaṃ karma tadvān 'saḥ'; naraḥ 'uttamo 'dhikārī'; syāditi yojanā /
GSP33bbdip11u:735: atra sannyāso nāma bhagavān sarvāṇi karmāṇi karoti sarvakarmāṇi bhagavatpūjārūpāṇīti ca jñātvā bhrāntyā jīvakartṛkatvena jñātānāṃ karmaṇāṃ bhagavati visargaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:738_1: bhavati / na ca militānāṃ trayāṇāṃ pratyekaṃ triṣvabhāvādasambhavaḥ, bhāve vādhamādilakṣaṇasya madhyamādiṣvativyāptyāpattiriti
GSP33bbdip11u:738_2: vācyam, uttaravākye pūrvasya pūrvavākye cottarasyānukarṣeṇa sarvatra sarvasya
GSP33bbdip11u:744: ta evottaratra saṅgṛhītāḥ pūrvatrānukṛṣṭāśca guṇā uttaroktāsteṣāṃ tatratatra bhaktimānityādiyathāsthitamūloktaguṇāpekṣayāprācuryeṇeti pakṣāntaramāhuḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:745_0: candrikāyāṃ tu pūrvapūrvasmin uttarottarasminnuktāprācuryeṇeti ṭīkārthamāśritya samānādhikaraṇānāṃ adhyayanaśamadamādisampattiviṣṇupādaikasaṃśrayatvādīnāṃ
GSP33bbdip11u:745_1: madhye yaḥ pracurādhyayanavān - itare tvapracure - so 'dhamo 'dhikārī /
GSP33bbdip11u:747: yaḥ pracuraviṣṇupādaikasaṃśrayatvādimān - itare tvapracure - sa uttamādhikārīti tallakṣaṇamedāt traividhyopapattiriti uktam /
GSP33bbdip11u:754: tatkutaḥ? udāhṛtapramāṇe brahmavidyāyāmiti kaṇṭhato 'nukteḥ kutaśca tatrādhikāratraividhyamityata āha - 'adhyayana'; iti /
GSP33bbdip11u:765: “śānto dānta uparatastitikṣuḥ samāhito bhūtvā ātmanyevātmānaṃ paśyet”(bṛ-u. 6-4-23)
GSP33bbdip11u:777: bṛhadbhāṣyarītyā - upa samīpe svahṛdayesthe viṣṇau santoṣavāniti vā /
GSP33bbdip11u:781: yadvā - 'yathāvastu tathā jñānaṃ tatsāmyātsamamīritam'; iti vacanāt samaṃ
GSP33bbdip11u:782: yathārthamāhitamādhānaṃ manovṛttirūpaṃ jñānaṃ icchā ca yasya sa tathoktaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:785_0: tathā ca - pūrvaṃ 'evaṃ'; vicchabdenokto hareḥ saṃsāramocakatvajñānīśāntyādimān 'bhūtvā'; 'ātmani'; svahṛdaye sthitaṃ 'ātmanaṃ';
GSP33bbdip11u:786: śāntādirbhūtvātmānaṃ vidyādityanena upanayanasya adhyayanārthatvavat śāntyāderbrahmavidyārthatvamuktaṃ bhavati /
GSP33bbdip11u:787: yadyapi paśyatīti śrutipāṭhaḥ tathāpi viṣṇutattvanirṇayaṭīkāyāṃ “sa tathā cakāreti kvacitpāṭhaḥ sa sadṛśaśākhāntaragato jñātavyaḥ, evamanyatrāpi”ityuktatvāt
GSP33bbdip11u:795: kāmyakarmasampāditān tata evāsāratvenānityatvena ca 'parīkṣya'; vivicya tena vivekena 'nirvedaṃ'; kāmyakarmaṇi tatphale ca vairāgyaṃ 'āyāt';
GSP33bbdip11u:797: yasmātsvarūpānandāvirbhāvarūpatvāt 'akṛto'; nityapumartharūpo mokṣaḥ 'kṛtena'; utpattināśavatphalatvenāvadhṛtakarmaṇā 'nāsti', kintu jñānena /
GSP33bbdip11u:803: yadvā - samprāptau sampuṭīkṛtau ariktau vā pāṇī yasya /
GSP33bbdip11u:809: parito vīkṣya pāralaukikatvena tadviparītānapi karmabhiścitān svargādilokān vināśina eva parīkṣya tebhyo 'nirvedamāyāt'; /
GSP33bbdip11u:815_0: atrāpi vijñānapadena brahmajñāniparabrāhmaṇapadena ca uttamādhikārī sūcitaḥ, 'devādīnāṃ tu tajjñānaṃ vijñānamiti kīrtitam';
GSP33bbdip11u:815_1: iti gītābhāṣyokteḥ, 'naiva devapadaṃ prāptāḥ brahmadarśanavarjitāḥ'; iti tattātparyokteśca /
GSP33bbdip11u:824: tataśca 'tasya'; adhikāriṇaḥ 'eṣaḥ'; prasannaḥ 'ātmā svāṃ tanūṃ'; rupaṃ
GSP33bbdip11u:826: prasiddhaḥ'; iti prameyadīpoktarītyā vṛṇuta ityanena bhaktatvaṃ sūcitam /
GSP33bbdip11u:829: yasya deve parā bhaktiryathā deve tathā gurau /
GSP33bbdip11u:830: sā ca bhaktiḥ viṣṇau sarvādhikā anyeṣvapi yathāyogyā brahmavidyopayoginītyarthe śvetāśvatarāṇāṃ śrutiṃ (śve. 6-23) darśayati -
GSP33bbdip11u:838: sarvādhikā 'bhaktiḥ'; asti 'tathā'; 'deve'; taditaradeveṣu brahmādiṣu 'yathā'; yathāyogyā bhaktirasti, 'tathā gurau'; anyeṣu svottameṣu ca yathā yogyā bhaktirasti /
GSP33bbdip11u:841: tenādhikāriṇā pūrvaṃ vedādibhirguruṇā vā 'kathitāḥ'; 'ete'; uktāḥ 'arthāḥ'; parāparatattvarūpāḥ
GSP33bbdip11u:851_0: 'ityādiśrutibhyaśca'; ityasya 'adhikāra uktaḥ'; ityanenānvayaḥ na kevalamuktaśrutibhiḥ, kintu “bhaktyā tvananyayā śakya ahamevaṃ
GSP33bbdip11u:852: nanu yadyadhyayanavatāmeva brahmavidyādhikāraḥ tarhi trivarṇetareṣāmadhyayanābhāvenādhikāro na syāt /
GSP33bbdip11u:853: tataśca teṣāṃ brahmajñānābhāvena mokṣābhāvassyādityāśaṅkāṃ smṛtyā pariharati -
GSP33bbdip11u:860: ante bhavāḥ antyāḥ teṣu jātāḥ 'antyajāḥ'; trivarṇabāhyāḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:866: tathā ca - na kevalaṃ traivarṇikāḥ, kintu ye antyajāḥ
GSP33bbdip11u:867_0: trivarṇabāhyāḥ śūdrādayaḥ pulkasāntāḥ te yadyapi vaidikabrahmajñānānadhikāriṇaḥ, tathāpi yato bhaktāḥ ato nāmajñānādhikāriṇaḥ
GSP33bbdip11u:871: striyaśca śūdrāśca brahmabandhavo brāhmaṇābhāsāśca teṣāmiti vigrahaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:876: ekadeśe parokte tu na tu granthapurassare /
GSP33bbdip11u:877: tantre 'pi na sarvatrādhikāraḥ, kintu ekadeśe eva /
GSP33bbdip11u:880: 'parokte'; pareṇānyena parārthaṃ prokte ārabdha evetyāha - 'ekadeśa'; iti
GSP33bbdip11u:888: tarhi vedotpannabrahmavidyāyāṃ keṣāmadhikāraḥ? pariśeṣāt traivarṇikānāṃ cet - teṣāmapi kiṃ sarveṣāmadhikāraḥ? na, kiṃ tu keṣāñcidityāha -
GSP33bbdip11u:894: “sapatnīṃ me parādhamapatiṃ me kevalaṃ kuru/”(maṃ-pra-16-2) ityādau strīṇāmapi vedādhikāradarśanāt kathaṃ tāsāmanadhikāra ityata
GSP33bbdip11u:900: - na kevalamuttamānāṃ devānāṃ strīṇāṃ nāmādijñāne 'dhikāraḥ kintu vaidike 'pi jñāne vedotpannabrahmavidyāyāmapi vaidikāḥ adhikāramāhuriti yojanā /
GSP33bbdip11u:901: yathorvaśī yamī caiva śacyādyāśca tathāparāḥ // iti //
GSP33bbdip11u:910: avarā iti vā, uttamadevastryapekṣayā madhyamaṛṣipatnīnāṃ avaratvāditi /
GSP33bbdip11u:912: yato nārāyaṇaprasādamṛte na mokṣaḥ,na ca jñānaṃ vinātyarthaprasādaḥ/
GSP33bbdip11u:914: evaṃ pratijñāpramāṇopanyāsābhyāṃ ānantaryapratiyogyadhikāravivaraṇamukhenāthaśabdaṃ saṃkṣepavistarābhyāṃ vyākhyāya sūtre 'kartavyā'; iti padaṃ ataśśabdaparāmarśanīyasamarpakaṃ
GSP33bbdip11u:915: 'yataḥ'; ityādikaṃ cādhyāhāryamiti darśayan 'ataśśabdo hetvarthe'; iti saṅkṣepeṇoktamarthaṃ viśadayati - 'yataḥ'; iti /
GSP33bbdip11u:917: tathāca - yatassukhameva me syāt duḥkhamīṣadapi mābhūditi sarvābhimato
GSP33bbdip11u:918_0: 'mokṣaḥ'; samyañcaṃ 'nārāyaṇaprasādaṃ ṛte'; vinā nāsti, sa ca 'atyarthaprasādaḥ'; atimātraprasādaśca nāparokṣajñānaṃ vinā,
GSP33bbdip11u:918_1: tacca na brahmajijñāsāṃ vinā, 'ato brahmajijñāsā kartavyā'; ityarthaḥ uktaṃ hi śabdādhikaraṇe tattvapradīpe “mokṣasyaiva
GSP33bbdip11u:919: samīco vinā viṣṇuprasādāt alabhyatvāt tasya ca atimātrasya aparokṣajñānaprasādhyatvāt tasya cāparokṣasya jijñāsāsamāyattattvādviṣṇureva jijñāsya ityuktam”iti/
GSP33bbdip11u:922: anena sūtre yato nārāyaṇaprasādamṛte na mokṣaḥ,
GSP33bbdip11u:923_0: kintu prasādenaiva, na ca jñānaṃ vinātyarthaprasādaḥ, kintu jñānenaiva, na ca jijñāsāṃ vinā jñānaṃ, kintu jijñānayaiva, ato
GSP33bbdip11u:925: evaṃ yato nārāyaṇaprasādamṛte na jñānaṃ na jijñāsā kintu prasādenaiva iti yojanāyāṃ ataḥśabdasyārthāntaramapi vivṛtaṃ bhavati /
GSP33bbdip11u:928: vākyaṃ veti satāṃ nītiḥ sāvakāśe na tadbhavatet //
GSP33bbdip11u:930: nanu sūtre 'kartavyā'; iti padasyaiva adhyāhāraḥ kutaḥ adhyāhārasya niraṅkuśatvena 'na kartavyā'; iti vākyasyaivādhyāhāraḥ kiṃ na syādityata āha - 'yatra'; iti /
GSP33bbdip11u:931: atra yatreti tatreti padamiti cāvartate, tathā
GSP33bbdip11u:933_0: tathā ca - 'yatra'; avāntaravākye yat 'padaṃ'; vinā 'anyatra'; arthāntare 'anavasaraḥ'; aghaṭanā 'tatra'; vākye tadeva 'padaṃ';
GSP33bbdip11u:934: yatra vākye yasmin vākye sāvakāśe arthāntare ghaṭanāvati sati tadeva padaṃ niyamena pratiṣṭhitaṃ prāptaṃ na bhavet /
GSP33bbdip11u:935: evaṃ yatra mahāvākye yadavāntaravākyaṃ vinānyatrānavasaraḥ tatra mahāvākye tadeva vākyaṃ
GSP33bbdip11u:936: pratiṣṭhitaṃ, yatra yasmin mahāvākye sāvakāśe sati tadavāntaravākyaṃ
GSP33bbdip11u:938: yatra vākye yatpadaṃ vākyaṃ vāpekṣitaṃ anyatrānyasyānavasara iti vā /
GSP33bbdip11u:944: “tamevaṃ vidvānamṛta iha bhavati, nānyaḥ panthā ayanāya vidyate”
GSP33bbdip11u:950_0: sahasraśīrṣatvādyuktaprakāreṇa 'iha'; loke 'vidvān'; parokṣajñānadvārā aparokṣato jānannevānte 'amṛto'; mukto bhavati, yato
GSP33bbdip11u:953: prasādasya mokṣasādhanatvaṃ tu ṭīkāsudhoktarītyā prasādaṃ vinā vidvatpadalakṣyāparokṣajñānamātreṇa mokṣo na
GSP33bbdip11u:956: “priyo hi jñāninotyarthamahaṃ sa ca mama priyaḥ”/
GSP33bbdip11u:958: 'na ca jñānaṃ vinā'; iti yadaparokṣajñānasya prasādasādhanatvamuktaṃ
GSP33bbdip11u:963: 'sa ca so 'pyaparokṣajñānī mama priyaḥ'; ityarthaḥ/ kṛṣṇavākyametat /
GSP33bbdip11u:965: “ātmā vā are draṣṭavyaḥ śrotavyo mantavyo nididhyāsitavyaḥ”
GSP33bbdip11u:966: prasādasya mokṣasādhanatvaṃ na kovalamarthāt jñāyate, kintu śrutyā cetyāśayena tatra kaṭhaśrutimāha 'yaṃ'; iti /
GSP33bbdip11u:968: tathā ca 'eṣaḥ'; paramātmā 'eṣaḥ'; icchārūpaḥ prasannaḥ san 'yaṃ';
GSP33bbdip11u:969: adhikāriṇaṃ 'vṛṇute'; anugṛhṇāti 'tena'; eva 'labhyaḥ'; prāpyaḥ, na tvanyena karmaṇetyarthaḥ
GSP33bbdip11u:971: paramātmā yaṃ vṛṇute yasya prasīdati tenaiva labhyaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:972: kathaṃ? yatastasya svāṃ tanuṃ vivṛṇute prakāśayati, tataścāsya svāṃ tanuṃ avidyāvṛtasvarūpāṃ vivṛṇute āvirbhāvayati”iti prakṛtānukūlatayā samagravākyārtha uktaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:973: yatpūrvaṃ jijñāsāyāḥ aparokṣajñānasādhanatvamupaskṛtavākyenoktaṃ tatra pramāṇatevana śrutimāha 'ātmā'; iti /
GSP33bbdip11u:977: tathā ca 'are'; maitreyi amṛtatvamiṣyate cettarhi 'ātmā'; paramātmā tvayā 'draṣṭavyo'; darśanena viṣayīkartavya ityarthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:991: ityādeḥ karmādināpi bhagavatprasādasiddheḥ kiṃ jñānena? prasādasya mokṣasādhanatābodhake “tamevaṃ vidvān”yamevaiṣa vṛṇute”ityādāviva “priyo
GSP33bbdip11u:993: / kāmyākāmyobhayakarmaṇeti yāvat/ tathā ca 'karmaṇā'; janyo yaḥ 'prasādaḥ'; sa 'adhamaḥ'; eva 'proktaḥ'; prāmāṇikaiḥ/ evaṃ
GSP33bbdip11u:998: 'prasādaḥ'; sa eva 'uttamo mataḥ'; utkṛṣṭatayā pramita ityarthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:1004: viṣṇoḥ prasādāt'; kāmyakarmasādhyāt 'svargalokaḥ'; bhāvyatayā vṛddhaiḥ 'prakīrtitaḥ'; ityarthaḥ
GSP33bbdip11u:1006: lokān”(mu.u. 1-2-12) iti śruteḥ kāmyakarmaṇāṃ vairāgyajananadvārā mokṣe 'pyupayogo 'stīti jñātavyam /
GSP33bbdip11u:1007: evaṃ akāmyakarmasādhyāt adhamaprasādāt antaḥkaraṇaśuddhyādidvārā mokṣo bhavatītyapi jñātavyam
GSP33bbdip11u:1008: na ca adhamaprasādaśūnyānāṃ atidveṣiṇāṃ duryodhanādīnāṃ kathaṃ svargaprāptiriti vācyam, bhāgavatācāryarahitānāṃ tadabhāvoktāvapi tadvatāṃ tatsambhavāt /
GSP33bbdip11u:1011: yānti svargaṃ tataḥ kṣipraṃ tamondhaṃ prāpnuvanti ca //
GSP33bbdip11u:1014: svargaloka ityuktyā tatraiva “mokṣaḥ sāṅkalpikaḥ svargaḥ bhūtāditvaṃ
GSP33bbdip11u:1015: phalaṃ kramāt”iti vacanokto yo nityasaṃsāribhī rājasarājasai rājasatāmasaiśca prāpya svargapratinidhitvena kalpito daityendralokaḥ
GSP33bbdip11u:1016: sāṅkalpikaḥ svargaḥ sa iha na vivakṣitaḥ, kintu saptalokāntargato rājasasāttvikaiḥ prāpyaḥ svargaloka eveti sūcitam /
GSP33bbdip11u:1018: 'janalokādiḥ'; ityatra tu janatyāgena janākhyalokasyaiva pratipattayarthaṃ lokaśabdaprayoga iti jñeyam /
GSP33bbdip11u:1021: tathā ca 'madhyamāt'; viṣṇoḥ prasādāt janalokasyādirmaharlokaḥ janatapolokādireva vā bhavati na muktiḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:1022: 'muktidastu'; uttamaprasāda eva prakīrtito vṛddhaiḥ, na tvanyāviti yojanā
GSP33bbdip11u:1023_0: / tathā ca karmādinā bhagavatprasādasiddhāvapi tasyānuttamatvāt jñānasādhyasyaivottamatvāt anuttamena svargādimātrasiddhāvapi
GSP33bbdip11u:1023_1: mokṣāsiddheḥ tatsādhanaprasādāya jñānamapekṣitamiti bhāvaḥ na cātra “īyustrīn karmaṇā lokān jñānenaiva taduttarān”iti vākyavirodhaḥ
GSP33bbdip11u:1027: tasya ca śravaṇādibhirityatra hyādipadena grahaṇādvā; nyāyāmṛtoktarītyā jñānadvāreti śeṣakaraṇādvā;
GSP33bbdip11u:1029: śravaṇaṃ mananaṃ caiva dhyānaṃ bhaktistathaiva ca /
GSP33bbdip11u:1031: karmādināpi jñānaṃ bhavatīti na tadarthaṃ jijñāsā kartavyā “ātmā”iti vākye
GSP33bbdip11u:1035: te ca śravaṇādīnāṃ kāryasādhane anyasāhityanirāsaktāḥ, “naraṃ ca
GSP33bbdip11u:1048: prāmāṇikaiḥ, na tvanyat sādhanameva neti yojanā /
GSP33bbdip11u:1050: na caitāni vinā kaścit jñānamāpa kutaścana // iti nāradīye //
GSP33bbdip11u:1051: viparītaṃ kiṃ na syādityata āha - 'na ca'; iti /
GSP33bbdip11u:1053: tathā ca 'etāni'; śravaṇādīni 'vinā kaścit'; api adhikārī 'kutaścana';
GSP33bbdip11u:1054: karmādessataḥ 'jñānaṃ nāpa'; evametāni śravaṇādīni santicet kutaśca karmādervinā jñānaṃ nāpeti neti yojanā /
GSP33bbdip11u:1055: tathā ca nirapekṣānvayavyatirekābhyāṃ śravaṇādyeva jñāne pradhānaṃ sākṣātsādhanaṃ,
GSP33bbdip11u:1056: karmādi tu tadabhāvāt pāramparyeṇa sādhanamiti na vaiparītyamiti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:1061: ityanena jijñāsāyāḥ nirviṣayatvaśaṅkānirāsāya prayuktaḥ sautro brahmaśabdo nārāyaṇapara iti vyākhyātaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:1063: nanu nārāyaṇaprasādamṛte na mokṣaścet tarhi tajjijñāsaiva kartavyā na brahmajijñāsā /
GSP33bbdip11u:1064: na ca vācyaṃ nārāyaṇa eva brahmapadena vivakṣitaḥ
GSP33bbdip11u:1069: 'pi brahmaśabdaḥ'; iti apyarthe, yata ityarthe ca /
GSP33bbdip11u:1070: tathā ca brahmaśabdasyānekārthatve 'pi yataḥ saḥ viṣṇāveva mukhyaḥ ato mukhyāmukhyayormukhyasyaiva grāhyatvāt sa eva sūtrakāravivakṣito jñāyata
GSP33bbdip11u:1072: atra śabdāntaraṃ vihāya viṣṇuśabdaprayogeṇa tacchabdagatānāṃ vargapañcamaṣaṣṭhacaturthānāṃ ṇaṣavānāṃ saṅkhyārekhālekhanena sūtrāṇāṃ catuṣṣaṣṭyuttarapañcaśatasaṅkhyoktā bhavati /
GSP33bbdip11u:1076: ityaitareyabhāṣyokteḥ deśakālaguṇāparicchedarūpatrividhapūrtivācakabrahmaśabdavyākhyānāya tādṛśaviṣṇuśabdaprayogaḥ/ ṭīkāyāṃ tu - atra viṣṇugrahaṇena “saviṣṇurāha hi
GSP33bbdip11u:1078: brahmamīmāṃsāyāḥ vyāsenārabdhatvādetadavyavahitadevamīmāṃsāntyasūtradvaye brahmatvena nārāyaṇasyaiva prakṛtatvaṃ sūcayatīti prayojanāntaramuktam /
GSP33bbdip11u:1079: tattvapradīpe 'pyetadeva 'yaśca devatāmīmāṃsānte “viṣṇureva hi tat śrutestaṃ brahmetyācakṣate”iti sarvadevottamatvena pratijñāto brahmatvena
GSP33bbdip11u:1080: coktaḥ, sa eva brahmaśabdenottaramīmāṃsāyāṃ vicāryatvenocyate'; iti
GSP33bbdip11u:1084: viṣṇāveva mukhya ityata āha - 'yaṃ'; iti/ 'brahmaśabdaśca'; ityādi atrāpi sambadhyate /
GSP33bbdip11u:1088: tathā ca yadyapi brahmaśabdo 'nyatra rūḍhaḥ, tathāpi 'śrutiḥ';
GSP33bbdip11u:1089: “yamanta”ityādikā yataḥ kavīnāṃ mate 'tadeva paramaṃ brahma'; ityāhuriti prayogabāhulyarūpāṃ rūḍhimāha, ato brahmaśabdo viṣṇāveva paramamukhya ityarthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:1092: yadoṣadhībhiḥ puruṣān paśūṃśca viveśa bhūtāni carācarāṇi /
GSP33bbdip11u:1093: ataḥ paraṃ nānyadaṇīyasaṃ hi parātparaṃ yanmahato mahāntam //
GSP33bbdip11u:1099: avijñeyatvarūpapūrvaviśeṣaṇaviśiṣṭe prasiddhe vā avināśini 'parame'; prajā adhīnāḥ santi /
GSP33bbdip11u:1100: yataḥ prasūtā jagataḥ prasūtī toyena jīvānvyasasarja bhūmyām //
GSP33bbdip11u:1101: 'jagataḥ prasūtī'; prasūtirjanayitrī mūlaprakṛtirlakṣmīḥ 'yato'; yasmāt prasūtā utpannā, sṛṣṭau abhimukhībabhūveti vā, yacca yadvastu 'toyena';
GSP33bbdip11u:1104: ityādyuktvā “tadevartaṃ tadu satyamāhustadeva brahma paramaṃ kavīnām”
GSP33bbdip11u:1108: 'carācarāṇi bhūtāni'; ityanenaiva siddhe yajñāṅgatvādinā viśiṣṭānāṃ vrīhyoṣadhīnāṃ grahaṇāya punarvacanam /
GSP33bbdip11u:1110: yasmāt 'paraṃ'; atiśayena 'anyat'; vastu 'aṇīyasaṃ'; aṇīyo nāsti, yacca
GSP33bbdip11u:1113: pūrṇaṃ tamasaḥ'; prakṛterajñānādvā 'parastāt'; atikramya sthitaṃ 'tadevartaṃ'; yathārthajñānarūpaṃ 'tadu'; tadeva 'satyaṃ';
GSP33bbdip11u:1124: śrutau ṇakārātparasyākārasya yathā hrasvatvaṃ tadvaditi nārāyaṇapaṇḍitācāryoktiḥ/ “vyasasarja visasarja bahulagrahaṇāt” iti prameyadīpoktirapi hrasvābhiprāyikaiva /
GSP33bbdip11u:1128: iti vicchidya 'tadakṣare'; ityeva ca paṭhitvā, “yaṃ puruṣaṃ samudre 'ntaḥ
GSP33bbdip11u:1129_0: kavayo vayanti vāñchanti tadakṣare yasmin tasmin akṣare nāśavarjite parame prajāstadādhārāḥ tiṣṭhanti, jagataḥ prasūtī jagajjanayitrī
GSP33bbdip11u:1129_1: prakṛtiḥ yataḥ prasūtā prādurbhūtā satī toyena itaramiśritena jīvān dehavattvena vyasasarja visṛṣṭavatī”ityekānvayena “tadeva
GSP33bbdip11u:1129_2: tātparyaviṣayībhūtatvādṛtaṃ tadevābādhitarūpatvātsatyaṃ tadeva kavīnāmabhimataṃ paraṃ brahma”ityartha
GSP33bbdip11u:1131: nārāyaṇapaṇḍitāryakṛtau tattvamañjaryāmapi 'tadakṣare'; iti paṭhitvā “yamavayanti avagacchanti yasmiṃstasmin akṣare prajāḥ santi yataḥ
GSP33bbdip11u:1132: prasūtā parādhīnaviśeṣaṃ prāptā śrīḥ toyena karmaṇā jīvān bhūmyāṃ prakṛtyāṃ vyasasarja”ityanvayena “tadevartaṃ śaśvadekaprakāraṃ satyaṃ sādhu guṇapūrṇaṃ”ityartha uktaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:1137: nanu 'tadeva'; iti vākye tacchabdena kuto viṣṇuniścayaḥ?
GSP33bbdip11u:1138: samudrasthatvaliṅgāditi cet - na, tasya rudrādāvapi kathañcitsambhavādityato niravakāśaviṣṇuśruterevetyāha - 'tannaḥ'; iti /
GSP33bbdip11u:1143: ityekadeśagrahaṇena “nārāyaṇāya vidmahe vāsudevāya dhīmahi, tanno viṣṇuḥ pracodayāt”iti samagravākyaṃ gṛhyate /
GSP33bbdip11u:1145: tathā ca yasmāt vayaṃ nārāyaṇaṃ 'vidmahe'; jānīmahe yataśca taṃ vāsudevaṃ
GSP33bbdip11u:1146: 'dhīmahi'; dhyāyemahi 'tat'; tasmāt 'naḥ'; asmān 'tat'; śubhaṃ prati 'viṣṇuḥ pracodayāt'; prerayatviti śrutyarthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:1149: rudraḥ'; ityādītaraśabdaśravaṇāt rudrāderapi mukhyabrahmatā prāptetyata āha - 'na ca'; iti
GSP33bbdip11u:1154: nāmani viśvābhi na santi loke yadāvirāsīdanṛtasya sarvam /
GSP33bbdip11u:1155: kuta ityatastatprāpakaśabdānāṃ viṣṇāveva mukhyatvāditi hetūpaskārabhipretya tasyāsiddhiparihārāya viṣṇormukhyataḥ sarvanāmavācyatve śrutimāha - 'nāmāni'; iti /

GSP33bbdip11u:2330: vāco vimuñcatha”iti mumukṣubhirheyatvavacanācceti sūtravṛttimabhipretya sūtraṃ vyācaṣṭe - tamiti /

GSP33bbdip11u:2346: nirguṇa eveti siddham/ tasyekṣatyanyathānupapattyā vācyatvamiti bhāvaḥ //

GSP33bbdip11u:2371: varāhādibahurūpāṇi sṛṣṭvā 'punaḥ'; atha pralaye 'ekībhūya'; mūlarūpeṇa tānyekatāṃ prāpayitvā ahipatau 'śete'; yoganidrāṃ karotītyarthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:2372: itītyasya iti śrutyuktatvāccetyadhyāhāreṇa 'vācyameva tat'; iti paramasādhyenānvayaḥ /

GSP33bbdip11u:2381: tathā ca pūrṇamiti śrutau svāpyayapadopalakṣitapūrṇatvasya vacanāt svasya svasminnevāpyayavacanācca,
GSP33bbdip11u:2382: sa iti spaṣṭaśrutāvapi ātmanyeva vilāpayīti svasya
GSP33bbdip11u:2383: svasminnevāpyayavacanāt, tasya ca nirguṇahariniṣṭhatāyāḥ smṛtau vacanācca ayaṃ nirguṇa eva na gauṇa iti yojanā /
GSP33bbdip11u:2384: vācyatve svāpyayasya sākṣāddhetutvābhāvāt sūtre bhāṣye ca caśabdābhāvaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:2386: tathāpyasya vācyatve sākṣadahetutvāttatra hetvantarasya jñāpakacaśabdo nānuvartanīyaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:2387: na ca śrutyuktatvāccetyadhyāhṛtahetau caśabdāvaśyaṃbhāvāt kathaṃ tadabhāva iti vācyam, sūtraśrutahetau caśabdābhāva ityabhiprāyāt /
GSP33bbdip11u:2389: tathā cāyaṃ sūtrārthaḥ - na kevalaṃ nirguṇaviṣṇvākhyaṃ
GSP33bbdip11u:2391: śrutyuktaṃ nirguṇameva na gauṇamiti kutaḥ? purṇatvātsvasya svasminnapyayācca,
GSP33bbdip11u:2394: nanvayaṃ svāpyayavān anyatrālīnaśca gauṇassyāt, nirguṇo 'nyo 'stīti cet -
GSP33bbdip11u:2395: na, yadyayaṃ svāpyayavān gauṇaḥ tarhyayaṃ nirguṇaścobhau pralaye 'nyatra
GSP33bbdip11u:2396: layahīnau tiṣṭhataḥ? uta ekasminnanyasya layo bhavati? nādyaḥ “idaṃ vā agne naiva kiñca nāsīt”(tai.brā. 2-2-9-1.) ityādiśrutivirodhāt, atra pralaye dvitīyamātraniṣedhāt /
GSP33bbdip11u:2399: tathā ca nirguṇasya saguṇe layo vācyaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:2400: sa ca na sambhavatītyāha - na hīti /

GSP33bbdip11u:2407_1: nirguṇo 'yamityatreva vā mukhyārthaguṇahīnaviṣaya iti sūcanāya nirguṇasyeti vaktavyatve 'pi

GSP33bbdip11u:2424: kuto netyatastatra hetutvena sūtramupanyasya vyācaṣṭe - gatīti /

GSP33bbdip11u:2428: vedāḥ'; tathā 'supramāṇāḥ'; suṣṭhu pramāṇaṃ pramāṇānantaraṃ mūlabhūtaṃ yāsāṃ tāḥ 'yuktayaḥ';
GSP33bbdip11u:2434: ataḥ 'sarveṣu vedeṣu'; tathā yuktiṣu 'tathetihāse'; itihāseṣu 'kutaścit'; kaścidapi viṣayakṛto
GSP33bbdip11u:2435: prakārakṛto vā 'virodho na'; ityarthaḥ jñānarūpamekameva brahmasvarūpaṃ
GSP33bbdip11u:2443: na tu viṣamatvamiti vā svayameva sākṣānna tvanyamukheneti vā evaśabdārthaḥ /

GSP33bbdip11u:2445: ekavidhatvokteḥ na kāsucicchākhāsu anyathocyata iti sūtrārthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:2446: atra bhinnaviṣayaprakārakeṣvapi jñāneṣu jñānatvena sāmyasattvātsāmyādityuktau viṣayaprakāraikyaṃ na siddhyatīti sāmānyāt samānatvāt ekavidhatvāt ityuktaṃ sūtre /

GSP33bbdip11u:2475: - eka iti”iti kvacitkaṭīkāpāṭhānusāreṇa bhāṣye kvacit śrutipāṭhānantaraṃ sūtrapāṭho dṛśyate
GSP33bbdip11u:2480: 'aśabdaḥ'; avācyaḥ padārtho 'na śrūyate'; na śrutipadenocyata ityarthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:2483: nanu aśabdasyāpi brahmaṇo lakṣaṇayā śrutatvaṃ kiṃ na syādityata āha - na ceti /

GSP33bbdip11u:2488: vipratipannaṃ na lakṣyaṃ, kenāpi padenāvācyatvāt vyatirekeṇa tīravaditi yuktiviruddhatvādityarthaḥ
GSP33bbdip11u:2489: tathā ca - nāsmābhiḥ kevalāvācyatvena lakṣyatvābhāvaḥ sādhyate yena tīrādau vyabhicāraḥ śaṅkayeta, kintu sarvaśabdāvācyatvena /
GSP33bbdip11u:2491: brahma tu na tathā, tasya sarvaśabdāvācyatayaiva pareṇāṅgīkṛtatvāt /
GSP33bbdip11u:2492: ato na vyabhicāra iti yuktivirodho duṣparihara iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:2493: nanu lakṣyatvābhāvavati pravāhādau hetvabhāvādasādhāraṇamiti cet - na,
GSP33bbdip11u:2494: lakṣaṇāyogyasyaiva lakṣyapadārthatve sarvapadārthānāmapi kiñcitpadalakṣaṇāyogyatvena tadabhāvarūpasādhyasya kutrāpyabhāvena sapakṣasyaivābhāvāt // 11 //
GSP33bbdip11u:2497: tameva samasvayaṃ prakaṭayati 'ānandamayo 'bhyāsāt'; ityādinā samastenādhyāyena prāyeṇa /

GSP33bbdip11u:2503: 'samanvayam'; upakramādiliṅgajñāpyaṃ samyagvacanavṛttyā sarvaśāstrīyavacanānāṃ harau nirūpaṇaṃ tatparatvaṃ 'prakaṭayati';
GSP33bbdip11u:2510: yathopakramādikaṃ tajjñāpyaṃ tātparyaṃ ca samanvayaśabdārthaḥ tathā bhāṣyaṃ yojitam adhastāt

GSP33bbdip11u:2515: prathamenetyanukttvā evaṃvacanena etadadhikaraṇamārabhyādhyāyārambhaḥ, pañcādhikaraṇyāstu nādhyāyāntarbhāva ityapi sūcitam /
GSP33bbdip11u:2517: caturthapāde na samanvayaḥ kriyata iti paramatanirāsāya 'samastena'; samagreṇetyuktam /
GSP33bbdip11u:2521: ata eva viṣṇutattvanirṇayaṭīkāyāṃ bhūmārthe 'prāyaḥ'; ityavyayamapyasti ityapiśabdaḥ prāyoji
GSP33bbdip11u:2523: prāyeṇānyatraprasiddhānāṃ śabdānāṃ paramātmani samanvayaḥ pradarśyate 'smin pāde /
