GSP33bbdip11u:2527: 'prasiddhānāṃ'; śrutyādito lokato vādmapātato rūḍhatvena pratīyamānānāṃ nāmātmakānāṃ 'śabdānāṃ'; 'paramātmani'; viṣṇau niruktaḥ 'samanvayaḥ';
GSP33bbdip11u:2530: tattvapradīpe tu eka eva bhāṣye prāyeṇeti śabdaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:2531: tasyaivottaratrāpi sambandha ityāśayena “prāyeṇānyatra prasiddhānāṃ śabdānāmiti ca
GSP33bbdip11u:2533: tathā - ānandamayādhikaraṇe liṅgavicārattadapi prāyeṇeti vyāvartyamiti coktam /
GSP33bbdip11u:2535: ṭīkāyāmapyāvṛttyabhiprāyeṇaikasyaiva punaruttaratrāpi anvayapradarśanāya pratīkagrahaṇaṃ kṛtamiti na granthavairūpyaṃ kalpyam /
GSP33bbdip11u:2536: ata eva tattvapradīpānusāreṇa “ānandamayanāmnaḥ iti ṭīkāyāmānandamayanāmaśbadaḥ ānandādināmaparo vā yojyaḥ”ityuktaṃ candrikāyām /
GSP33bbdip11u:2541: caturthapāde tu pradhānasyāśābdatvoktirityevaṃ rūpo 'smaduktādanyaprakāreṇa pādārtho na vācyaḥ ityarthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:2553: ca brahmaṇi samanvayakaraṇāt asyāstu śāstre 'dhyāye pāde cāntarbhāvarūpā saṅgatiḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:2554: tathāpi ānandamayasya viṣṇutvasamarthane kā pūrvasaṅgatirityato 'vyavahitapūrvādhikaraṇenaiva saṅgatirvaktavyeti niyamābhāvāt
GSP33bbdip11u:2555: vyavahitapūrveṇa jijñāsādhikaraṇena tadviṣayeṇa ca asyānantaryalakṣaṇalakṣitāmākṣepikīṃ saṅgatiṃ tāvaddarśayati - brahmeti //
GSP33bbdip11u:2562_0: ānandamayākhyasya kasyacitpucchākhyāvayavabhūtaṃ pratīyata ityarthaḥ / nanu brahmaṇo 'vayavatvoktāvapi kimarthamānandamayasya
GSP33bbdip11u:2562_1: viṣṇutvasamarthanamityata āha - na hīti / hiśabdo hetau / 'ata'; ityāvartate
GSP33bbdip11u:2566: pratiṣṭhā'; iti śrutau jijñāsyatayoktaṃ brahma ānandamayākhyasya kasyacidavayavarūpaṃ 'pratīyate'; ucyate yataśca anyāṅgatayā jijñāsyatve
GSP33bbdip11u:2567: 'pi 'avayavinam'; ānandamayaṃ vinā 'avayavamātrasya'; avayavasyaiva kevalasya brahmaṇo na pṛthak 'jñeyatā'; jijñāsyatā sambhavati /
GSP33bbdip11u:2572_0: ataḥ śaṅkārūpasaṅgatisadbhāvāt atrānandamayasya viṣṇvanyatvapakṣe brahmajijñāsākṣepāt viṣṇutvapakṣe ca tatsamādhānāt evaṃ
GSP33bbdip11u:2587: jīvaśarīragatāt vijñānapūrṇatvāt vijñānamayaśabdavācyāt viṣṇoḥ ananyo 'pyanyaśabdoktaḥ 'ānandamayaḥ'; ānandapūrṇatvādānandamayaśabdavācyaḥ
GSP33bbdip11u:2601: tadevānandamayākhyasya jīvaśarīrasya parairanyairupakartṛbhiḥ prāpyatvāt priyanāmakamupakārajanyavaiṣayikasukhākhyaṃ yacchiraḥ tatsthaṃ ca /
GSP33bbdip11u:2610: evamānandamayākhyasya viṣṇoḥ 'pucchaṃ'; pratiṣṭhati gacchati loka ābhyāmiti vyutpattyā pratiṣṭhāpadokto yaḥ pādākhyo 'vayavaḥ tadbrahma
GSP33bbdip11u:2612: viśvaguṇavṛddhikaratvādbrahmaśabdavācyaḥ sa evānandamayākhyajīvaśarīrasya yat pucchaṃ yaḥ pādākhyo 'vayavaḥ tatsthite brahmākhye pradhānavāyau
GSP33bbdip11u:2618: bhūtāḥ ye priyādayaḥ te viṣṇvabhinnāḥ ye cānandamayādijīvakośāvayavāḥ priyādayaste pratiśarīraṃ bhinnā iti dvividhāḥ priyādaya ityuktaṃ bhavati
GSP33bbdip11u:2619: / yathoktaṃ candrikāyām - ye jīvābhimanyamānānandamayādikośāvayavāḥ priyādayaste pratiśarīraṃ bhinnāḥ, na te ānandamayādyākhyasya
GSP33bbdip11u:2621: ye ca bhagavato 'vayavāḥ priyādayo na te pratiśarīraṃ bhinnā kintvabhinnā iti jīvasvarūpasyānandasya hṛdayākhyamadhyagatatvātkośamadhyadehatvaṃ svarūpadehasya jaḍāvayavatvaṃ
GSP33bbdip11u:2624: ityudāhariṣyamāṇavacanaparyālocanayādmanandamayākhyo nārāyaṇaḥ punarnārāyaṇādirūpeṇa pañcadhā bhinnaḥ śiraḥprabhṛtyavayavātmanā tiṣṭhatīti pratīyate /
GSP33bbdip11u:2630: dehasthavāyusaṃsthaṃ ca brahma sṛṣṭyā tu bṛṃhayet // iti /
GSP33bbdip11u:2634_0: tathā tatraiva “'abhāvaṃ bādariḥ'; iti sūtreṇa 'priyāpriye'; (chāṃ. 8-12-1.) iti śrutisthapriyaśabdena 'pareyaṃ priyanāmakam';
GSP33bbdip11u:2634_1: iti taittirīyachāndogyabhāṣyayoruktatvātparaprāpyasukhasāmānyavācakena prākṛtaṃ sukhaṃ grāhyamiti sūcitam”iti coktam /
GSP33bbdip11u:2641: eteṣu pañcasu dehākhyakośeṣu tattacchabdavācyāni puruṣākārāṇi aniruddhapradyumnasaṅkarṣaṇavāsudevanārāyaṇarūpāṇi dehadehibhāvena vartanta iti /
GSP33bbdip11u:2643: na hyavayavinaṃ vinā avayavamātrasya jñeyatetyata āha // -
GSP33bbdip11u:2646: evaṃ saṅgatiṃ phalaṃ coktvā viṣayasaṃśayau darśayati - ānandamaya iti //
GSP33bbdip11u:2649: brahmā caturmukhaḥ, ādiśabdena rudrendrabṛhaspatimukhā devāstattaddehāgatajīvāśca gṛhyante
GSP33bbdip11u:2657: brahmaśabdasya anyatrāpi vṛtteḥ kathaṃ tena caturmukhasyānandamayatvaniśca ityato yuktyantaramāha - śateti
GSP33bbdip11u:2659: “te ye śataṃ prajāpaterānandāḥ, sa eko brahmaṇa
GSP33bbdip11u:2666: evamekaṃ pūrvapakṣamabhidhāya anyamāha - aṣṭamūrtitvāditi // caśabdo rudrasya ceti sambadhyate
GSP33bbdip11u:2670: (tai.u. 2-8-5.) ityānandamayasya sūrye sthiteḥ uktatvādrudrasya ca sūryādyaṣṭaśarīratvādityarthaḥ
GSP33bbdip11u:2671: tathā ca - rūdraliṅgasya ānandamaye śrutatvāt ānandamayo rudra evepi bhāvaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:2673: sūryo jalaṃ mahī vahnirvāyurākāśa eva ca /
GSP33bbdip11u:2683: kutaḥ? brahmaśabdāt/ ānandamaye śrutasya brahmaśabdasya 'mama yonirmahadbrahma tasmin garbhaṃ
GSP33bbdip11u:2684: dadhāmyaham'; iti gītāyāṃ citprakṛtau prayogāditi/ smṛtau - mahat brahmeti bhinne pade
GSP33bbdip11u:2685: tathā ca mahat brahmaśabdavācyā lakṣmīḥ mama yoniḥ garbhādhānārthaṃ bhāryā /
GSP33bbdip11u:2686: tasmin brahmaṇi prakṛtau ahaṃ garbhaṃ dadhāmi dadha ityarthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:2688: kathaṃ sāvakāśena brahmaśabdena prakṛterānandamayatvaniścaya ityato hetvantaramāha -
GSP33bbdip11u:2704: kuto brahmaśabdasya jīvavācitvamityata uktam - bṛha jātīti /
GSP33bbdip11u:2713: tathā ca - na kevalaṃ brahmaśabdāt, kintu, yato jīvānām 'annarasamayaḥ';
GSP33bbdip11u:2717: ata eva tattvapradīpe - “brahmādiryasya devatāsaṅghasya”ityapi brahmādirityasya vigraho darśitaḥ
GSP33bbdip11u:2719: atha indrādīnāṃ “brahmā śivaḥ sureśādyāḥ”iti vacanoktakrameṇa kṣaradevoktyanantaramakṣarāyāḥ prakṛteruktiḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:2725: siddhāntayati - tathāpīti // yadyapyevamanyeṣāṃ prāptiḥ, tathāpi atra ye
GSP33bbdip11u:2730: anenodāhṛtānandamaya iti sūtrapratijñābhāgasya saṅgatyarthamanvayārthaṃ samanvayasūtrodāhṛto vidheyasamarpakaḥ 'tattu';
GSP33bbdip11u:2732: kuta ānandamayo viṣṇurevetyataḥ pravṛttaṃ sautraṃ hetuṃ vyācaṣṭe - tadeveti /
GSP33bbdip11u:2733_0: ityādiṣu vākyeṣu tasminviṣṇāveva prasiddhasya mukhyārthatvenoktasya brahmaśabdasya tasminnānandamaye ānandamayaṃ pratyudāhṛte
GSP33bbdip11u:2738: ko nu brahmaśabdodito bhavet'; iti vākyaṃ gṛhyate /
GSP33bbdip11u:2750: tathā ca yato viṣṇuḥ paraḥ, ataḥ 'pare'; viṣṇāveva brahmaśabdo mukhyatayā 'iṣyate'; aṅgīkriyate prāmāṇikaiḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:2753: kuta ityatasteṣāṃ brahmaśabdamukhyārthatvābhāve hetumāha - 'pare'; anye yasmādasampūrṇā iti
GSP33bbdip11u:2755: brahmaṇī veditavye'; (maitri.u. 6-22.) 'brahmāṇi jīvāḥ sarve 'pi'; ityādau brahmaśabdasteṣu kathamiṣyata ityata āha - kvacidanyatreṣṭo 'pi
GSP33bbdip11u:2760: ātmā'; (tai. u. 2-2-1.) ityādau brahmavācakātmaśabdābhyāsādityapyartho varṇanīya iti jñāpanamityuktaṃ candrikāyām /
GSP33bbdip11u:2761: 'vāsudevātmakam'; iti vyāsasmṛtivākyaṃ tu 'buddhyāvihiṃsan puṣpairvā praṇavena samarcayet'; iti pūrvavākyena saha yojanīyam /
GSP33bbdip11u:2762: atra hi vāsudevātmakaṃ brahmetyāderbhagavān brahmeti pratīyate iti nyāyadīpokteḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:2768: anena yatīnāṃ vaiṣṇavatvaprayuktāt tulasīpuṣpādyāharaṇarūpādvaiśeṣikāddharmādahiṃsālakṣaṇaḥ sāmānyadharma eva balavānityuktaṃ bhavati /
GSP33bbdip11u:2772: aṣṭākṣareṇa vā samarcayedityanena vācikapūjocyate iti jñātavyam /
GSP33bbdip11u:2784: ānandamaya ityasti, kiṃ tu viṣṇuriti ca /
GSP33bbdip11u:2786: tathā ca - ānandamayo na viṣṇuḥ, kintu, prakṛtyādaya eva /
GSP33bbdip11u:2797: kuta ityataḥ pravṛttaṃ sautraṃ hetuṃ vyācaṣṭe - pracureti /
GSP33bbdip11u:2804_0: mayaṭchabdasya prācuryarūpārthāntaramapekṣya pravṛttatvena tadvirodhābhāvāditi bhāvaḥ mayaḍityākhyapratyayasya prācuryārthatvaṃ
GSP33bbdip11u:2804_1: ca 'tādātmyārthe vikārārthe prācuryārthe mayaṭ tridhā'; iti vacanātsiddhamityapi herarthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:2805_0: yadyapi śrutisūtragatānandamaya iti vyākhyeyapadasya taddhitāntasyārthakathanāya tadanukūlatayā ānandaḥ pracuro yasmin sa
GSP33bbdip11u:2805_1: ānandapracuraḥ iti samāsaḥ kāryo na tadviparītaḥ pracura ānando 'smin sa pracurānanda iti /
GSP33bbdip11u:2806: tathāpyāndamaya iti taddhitavṛttyananuguṇānandapracuraiti samāsavākyābhidhāne brāhmaṇapracuro grāma itivat ānānandasyāpi prāptestadvāraṇāya pracurānanda iti viparītasamāsaḥ kṛtaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:2809: tathāpi uktaprayojanābhiprāyeṇa pracurānandatvāditi sautravyāsavākyaviparītasamāsaḥ kṛta ityāhuḥ
GSP33bbdip11u:2812: yadyapyānandamaya iti śrutisūtrānusāreṇa prācuryasya viśeṣyatvenoktāvapi nānānandaprāptiḥṣa prākāśapracuro ravirityukte 'pi savitaryandhakāraleśāpratīteḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:2815_0: tathāpi prācuryasya viśeṣaṇatāyāmanānandāprāpteḥ parairapi svīkṛtatvāt viśeṣyatāyāṃ tu tasya samānādhikaraṇavijātīyālpatvanirūpyatvāt
GSP33bbdip11u:2821: annādivikārārthānnamayādiśabdaissaha paṭhitatvādityata āha - annādīnāṃ ceti // idaṃ cāvartate
GSP33bbdip11u:2825: tathā ca na kevalamānandasya mayaṭchabdaḥ, kintvannādīnāṃ sambandhimayaṭchabdo 'pi annādīnāṃ prācuryameva vaktītyarthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:2829: 'annamayatvādeśca'; iti, atra ca 'annādīnām'; iti bahūnāṃ grahaṇāt,
GSP33bbdip11u:2839: na kevalaṃ sahapāṭhavirodhābhāva iti cārthaḥ/ tathā cetthaṃ yojanā - 'tatprācuryam';
GSP33bbdip11u:2842: na cālpārthatvena māhātmyarūpatvābhāvātsa kathaṃ harau yujyata iti vācyam /
GSP33bbdip11u:2843: yato 'trānnaśabdena sudhoktarītyā bhāvapradhānena tattadbhūtādyatvabhūtāttṛtvarūpārthadvayameva yujyate, ucyate na prasiddhānnam /
GSP33bbdip11u:2848: śrutyarthastu - yato bhūtaiḥ prāṇibhiḥ 'adyate'; upajīvyate 'bhūtānyatti'; saṃharati ca
GSP33bbdip11u:2857: tathā ca sudhoktarītyā gauṇyā vṛttyā upajīvyatvamevādyatvaṃ
GSP33bbdip11u:2860: tattvapradīpe tu - “na cānyānnaṃ sarvabhūtādyaṃ, na ca tatkasyāpi
GSP33bbdip11u:2873: annātpuruṣaḥ”(tai.u. 2-1-2.) iti prasiddhānnavikāradehamuktvā “sa vā eṣa puruṣo 'nnarasamayaḥ”(tai.u.
GSP33bbdip11u:2874: 2-1-3.) iti ya eva puruṣaḥ so 'nnarasamaya iti annavikārapuruṣaparāmarśādanuvādāt /
GSP33bbdip11u:2878: tathāceti vākyena yasmādātmanaḥ ākāśādikamutpannaṃ sa eṣa puruṣa iti 'anyasya'; dehādanyasyātmanaḥ
GSP33bbdip11u:2880: kimarthamasau parāmṛśyate ityāśaṅkāpanodanāya parāmarśāditi vaktavye prārambhādityāha /
GSP33bbdip11u:2881: pūrvamātmanaḥ ākāśādikāraṇatvamuktvā tasyaiva 'anyārtham'; anyakāryāya annamayādipañcarūpatvapradarśanāya punaḥ 'prārambhāt';
GSP33bbdip11u:2887: tathā ca yasmātsatyatvādilakṣaṇopetādātmana ākāśādikamutpannaṃ 'saḥ'; ātmapadodito bhūtādisraṣṭā 'eṣaḥ'; jīvaśarīragaḥ
GSP33bbdip11u:2894: nanvevaṃ mayaṭchabdasyobhayārthe prayogādatrāpyubhayapakṣe doṣadarśanātpañcānāṃ mayaṭāṃ prācuryamevārtho na vikāritvamityatra kiṃ
GSP33bbdip11u:2896: (chā.u. 6-2-1.) ityādiśrutivirodhaḥ syāt ityata āha - ye 'nnaṃ brahmeti //
GSP33bbdip11u:2905: evaṃ pradarśite hetudvaye 'dhyāhṛtahetudvārānvayayogye krameṇa sādhye āha - na vikāritvamiti
GSP33bbdip11u:2912: 'brahmaśabdāt'; brahmaśabdaśravaṇādanyathāsiddhatatsamabhivyāhārāt ubhayathāpi sambhavatāṃ mayaṭāṃ prācuryamevārthaḥ na vikāritvamiti niścīyate /
GSP33bbdip11u:2914: evamekasyaiva brahmaṇo 'bahurūpatvācca'; śabdādekasyaiva bahurūpatvavacanopapatteḥ 'ekameva'; iti śrutivirodho 'pi neti /
GSP33bbdip11u:2927: tataścānnamayādīnāṃ madhye ekasyaiva brahmatvakalpanā ca na yuktaiva, prāyapāṭhavirodhena kliṣṭatvādityarthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:2928: yastu vādī annamayādīnāṃ pañcānāmapyabrahmatāṃ brūte, sa tu sūtrakāreṇaiva
GSP33bbdip11u:2930: tattvapradīpe tu - na ceti vākyaṃ na ca māyinā pṛthakkalpanā 'satyaṃ jñānamanantaṃ brahma';
GSP33bbdip11u:2932: annamayādayaḥ pañcakośā mitho bhinnāḥ teṣāṃ brahmaśabdoktatve 'pi abrahmatvam/ antyapucchasyaiva brahmatvam /
GSP33bbdip11u:2938: 'imān lokān'; (tai.u. 3-10-5.) ityādiko vākyaśeṣaḥ saguṇavākyaikavākyatāpannaḥ tatphalapratipādaka ityādikā yuktā /
GSP33bbdip11u:2941: bhāṣyakāraḥ savistaraṃ viśiṣya na nirācakhyāviti ṭīkābhiprāyābhyupagamāt /
GSP33bbdip11u:2944: 'ghṛtapracura odanaḥ'; ityādau bhedasthala eva tathā prayogādityata āha -
GSP33bbdip11u:2951: tathā ca prakāśasvarūpe 'pi sūryabimbe viśeṣabalāt 'pracuraprakāśo raviritivat'; evaṃrūpavyavahāravat ānandādisvarūpe 'pi
GSP33bbdip11u:2952: harau viśeṣeṇa tathā vyavahāro yujyata eveti na tadanupapattirityarthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:2955: yadeṣa ākāśa ānando na syāt'; (tai. 2-7.) iti /
GSP33bbdip11u:2957: ityatra ca hetuṃ pratipādayatsūtramupanyasyati - taddhetviti // ānandamaya iti tattviti cānuvartate
GSP33bbdip11u:2962_0: 'taddhetuvyapadeśāt'; tasminnānandamayaprakaraṇe tasya viṣṇoḥ tasmin anandapūrṇatvenānandamayatve prācuryasyaiva mayaḍarthatve
GSP33bbdip11u:2963: / 'yat'; yadā yadi 'eṣaḥ ākāśaḥ'; āsamantātprakāśamāno viṣṇurānandaḥ pūrṇānando na syāt tadāsau lokaṃ na pravartayediti śeṣaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:2966: tadā 'ko hyevānyāt'; ko vā janaḥ lokaṃ ceṣṭayet /
GSP33bbdip11u:2970: sudhāyāṃ tu ṇyarthānandarbhāvena na ko 'pi lokikīṃ vaidikīṃ pravṛttiṃ kuryāditi vyākhyātam
GSP33bbdip11u:2974: brahma'(tai.2-1) iti mantravarṇalakṣitaṃ parameva brahma śabdānusandhānādgīyate /
GSP33bbdip11u:2976: brahmaśabdasya aparabrahmaṇi jīve 'pyupapatteḥ/ tasya parabrahmaṇi mukhyatve 'pi viṣṇoḥ ānandamayāvayavatvoktyādinā bādhakenāmukhyārthasyaiva
GSP33bbdip11u:2977: grahaṇopapatterityāśaṅkāṃ pariharat ānandamayādiśabdavācyasya viṣṇutve yuktyantaraṃ vadan sūtraṃ paṭhitvā vyācaṣṭe - māntravarṇikamiti /
GSP33bbdip11u:2978: yata ityādau yojyaṃ, 'na te'; iti pratijñānuvartate /
GSP33bbdip11u:2980: jñānamanantaṃ brahma'; (tai.u. 2-1-1.) iti 'mantravarṇe'; mantrākṣare tadātmakavākyaviśeṣe 'lakṣitaṃ'; lakṣaṇavattayā proktameva parameva brahma
GSP33bbdip11u:2981: nālakṣitaṃ, nāparamityevārthaḥ/ annamayādiśabdaiḥ 'gīyate'; pratipādyate ato 'pyānandamayādayo nāpare /
GSP33bbdip11u:2986: 'śabdānāṃ'; satyaṃ jñānamanantam ityevaṃrūpāṇām annamayādiśabdānāṃ ca arthānusandhānāt jātāt 'anusandhānāt'
GSP33bbdip11u:2994: parabrahmatajjñānatatprāptīḥ sūcayitvā saṅkṣepeṇaktvā tatra prāptaśaṅkāpanodāya pravṛtto mantravarṇaḥ
GSP33bbdip11u:2995: tato 'tra lakṣitaṃ paraṃ brahmaiveti jñāyata ityarthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:2998: tathā ca na kevalaṃ brahmaśabdādevānandamayādiviṣṇvākhyaṃ parabrahmaiva nāparabrahmetyavasīyate
GSP33bbdip11u:3000: jñānam'; iti vedavākyena lakṣaṇavattayā proktaṃ paraṃ brahamaivānnamayādiśabdaiḥ 'gīyate'; pratipādyate ca /
GSP33bbdip11u:3004: parabrahmaprāptikāmaḥ parabrahma jānīyāt iti śruteḥ phalito 'rthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:3008: paramātmānantaḥ pūrṇānandatvādityānandamayaśabdenopapādyata iti satyādiśabdānāṃ annamayādiśabdānāṃ cakārthatvam anusandheyam /
GSP33bbdip11u:3013: 'sa śiraḥ, sa dakṣiṇaḥ pakṣaḥ, sa uttaraḥ pakṣaḥ,
GSP33bbdip11u:3014: sa ātmā, sa puccham'; iti tasyaivāvayavatvokteścaturvedaśikhāyām /
GSP33bbdip11u:3015: nanu viṣṇorānandamayatvaṃ na yuktaṃ, tasya tadavayavatvāt /
GSP33bbdip11u:3021: avayavatve ca avayavitvasya virodho 'pi neti caśabdārthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:3022: kuta ityato 'vayavina evāvayavatvasyāvayavitvasya ca śrutyuktatvenāvayavyāderavayavādyabhedādityāśayena tāṃ śrutimudāharati -
GSP33bbdip11u:3024: 'saḥ'; nārāyaṇaḥ 'śiraḥ'; śīrṣaṃ, śiraḥ sa iti vā /
GSP33bbdip11u:3027: 'pakṣo'; bāhuḥ 'uttaraḥ'; savyaḥ 'ātmā'; madhyadehaḥ 'pucchaṃ'; pādau itītyasyaivaṃrūpāyāṃ caturvedaśikhāyāṃ tasyaivāvayavibhūtasyaiva viṣṇoravayavatvokterityanvayaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:3029: evaṃ avayavasyāvayavitve na kevalamiyaṃ śrutiḥ, kintu - bhāṣye upalakṣaṇayā gṛhītā 'padaṃ pucchaṃ pratiṣṭhā vai puruṣaḥ'; iti tattvapradīpodāhṛtaśrutirapi pramāṇatayā grāhyā /
GSP33bbdip11u:3031: śiro nārāyaṇaḥ pakṣo dakṣiṇassavya eva ca /
GSP33bbdip11u:3034: pucchaṃ saṅkarṣaṇaḥ proktaḥ eka eva tu pañcadhā //
GSP33bbdip11u:3039: avayavina avayavatvaṃ viruddhamityāśaṅkāṃ śrutyā parihṛtyātra smṛtiṃ cāha
GSP33bbdip11u:3051: asmin pakṣe tu - tadaṃśe vaiparītyamityupāsanābhedena pakṣabhedoktiḥ/ saṅkarṣaṇastūbhayatra
GSP33bbdip11u:3057: pañcadhā vibhaktaḥ eka evāyavaiḥ abhinna eva na tu bhinnaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:3059: avayavatvena 'aṅgitvena'; avayavitvena prakāreṇa tadbhāvaṃ prāptaḥ krīḍata ityarthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:3061: nanvastavevaṃ tāvatā na virodhaparihāro jāta ityata āha - aiśvaryāditi /
GSP33bbdip11u:3063: avayavibhāvādyāpanne janārdane 'tasmin'; avayavatvādau tadviṣaye 'virodhaḥ'; sahānavasthānarūpo 'na cintyaḥ'; na kenacitkalpyaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:3070: ayam avayava iti bhedavyavahāravirodho 'pi netyapi vyākhyeyam /
GSP33bbdip11u:3075: avayavo vā nāvayavī avayavatvāllokavaditi tarkapadoktānumānena? nādyo 'siddhatvāt /
GSP33bbdip11u:3077: 'hi'; yasmādatarkyaḥ tasmāt 'atarkye'; tarkāgocare bhagavati tadviṣaye 'tarkaḥ'; avayavī nāvayavaḥ avayavitvāt ityādirūpo hetuḥ 'kutaḥ'; sādhako bādhako vā netyarthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:3078: kiñca - loke parimitaśaktitva eva virodhadarśanāt viṣṇorvirodhopayogiparimitaśaktiśūnyatvāt tarkyatvāṅgīkāre 'pi na virodha
GSP33bbdip11u:3080: 'aprameye'; deśakālaguṇairaparicchinne bhagavati 'pramā'; etāvadeva sāmarthyaṃ nāto 'dhikamiti śaktiparicchedaḥ 'kutaḥ';
GSP33bbdip11u:3082: tathā ca paroktatarkasya sopādhikatvenāpramāṇatvānna virodhitvamiti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:3088: nanu yaduktaṃ sa vā iti vākye 'sya paramātmana eva parāmarśaḥ na annātpuruṣaḥ ityuktadehasyeti tadayuktam; ātmano dūrasthatvāddehasya sa
GSP33bbdip11u:3090: kiñca - puruṣapadena prakṛtasyaiva puruṣapadenoktatvāt ātmanaśca tena aprakṛtatvātpuruṣapadena parāmarśāyogaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:3093: puruṣaḥ prakṛtistho hi bhuṅkte prakṛtijān guṇān //
GSP33bbdip11u:3094: iti vākyadvayasthapuruṣapadena ekavidhenaiva vyavasthāyā paramātmajīvayoruktigrahaṇavadihāpi ekavidhenaiva dviruktena puruṣapadena vyavasthayārthadvayoktyaṅgīkāro 'stviti vācyam /
GSP33bbdip11u:3095: tatra duḥkhānubhavitṛtvarūpabhedakaśrutivatprakṛte bhedakābhāvena annātpuruṣaḥ ityatra dehaḥ, sa vā ityatra ca paramātmaivocyata iti
GSP33bbdip11u:3096: vyavasthāṅgīkārāyogādityata āha - raseti // sa vā eṣaḥ iti vartate /
GSP33bbdip11u:3100: tathā ca sa vā iti vākyena cideva cinmātraṃ brahmacaitanyameva ucyate parāmṛśyate na dehaḥ
GSP33bbdip11u:3101: na ca tasya dūroktivirodhaḥ, puruṣapadenāprakṛtatvavirodhaśceti vācyam /
GSP33bbdip11u:3103: ityākāśādipuruṣāntaśabdairuktaṃ tattatsārabhūtam ākāśādipadārthaśreṣṭhabhūtaṃ cinmātraṃ brahmaiva sa vā iti parāmarśavākyenocyate /
GSP33bbdip11u:3104: evaṃ tarhi puruṣapadena dvayorapi prakṛtatvādubhayaparāmarśo 'yamastviti na ca vācyam /
GSP33bbdip11u:3105: yataḥ tatsārabhūtaṃ puruṣasārabhūtaṃ cinmātraṃ brahmaivānyadehādikaṃ vihāya saḥ iti parāmarśavākyenocyate
GSP33bbdip11u:3109: rasaśabdena rasaśabdārthena mukhyatvena viśeṣaṇāt viśeṣitatvāt annatvarūpaviśeṣaṇasyeti vā
GSP33bbdip11u:3116: kutaḥ? atra sa vā eṣaḥ (tai.u. 2-1-3.) ityādau raso vai saḥ ityante cānnamayādīnāṃ kośavyāvṛttyarthaṃ tadbhedārthameva rasaśabdena viśeṣaṇāt viśeṣitatvādityarthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:3122: kintu brahmaiva tasyaiva ca saḥ ityādau parāmarśaḥ, tadā tasyedameva śiraḥ
GSP33bbdip11u:3123: (tai.u. 2-1-3.) iti pratyakṣanirdeśo nopapadyate/ na ca vācyam
GSP33bbdip11u:3127: svasyāparokṣato jñātatvena śabdānapekṣaṇāt upadeśyapuruṣāṇāṃ cāparokṣāyogyatvānnirdeśavaiyarthyamityata tadasyetyapi vyākhyeyam /
GSP33bbdip11u:3128_0: tathā ca asya annamayabhagavacchiraḥpakṣādeḥ dṛśyamānapratyakṣasiddhadehaśiraḥpakṣādau vastravarmāntarvartijānuvīrāvayavavat
GSP33bbdip11u:3128_1: sannihitatvāt samyaṅniyāmakatvena sthitatvāt lakṣaṇayā brahmaśirasi idamiti nirdeśo yujyata iti yojanā /
GSP33bbdip11u:3130: tathā ca vastraprāvṛte varmāntargate vā jānunīdaṃ jānviti vyavahāravadayamapi vyavahāro yujyata eveti na tadvirodha iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:3136: anyo 'ntara ātmā prāṇamayaḥ'; (tai.u. 2-2-2.) iti parasparaṃ bhinnatvenoktatvāt /
GSP33bbdip11u:3138: 'ekameva'; iti śrutivirodhaḥ ityapyayuktamapramitatvādityata āha - ananya iti // apiryadyapītyadyarthe
GSP33bbdip11u:3140: tathā ca 'puruṣottamo bhagavānviṣṇuḥ'; 'ananyo 'pi'; abhinno 'pi anyo bhinna iti
GSP33bbdip11u:3153: brahmāṇḍe purāṇe ityanantaram uktatvānna virodha ityanvayaḥ/
GSP33bbdip11u:3158: nānyaḥ panthā ayanāya vidyate'; (tai. ā. 3-12-7.) iti hyuktam /
GSP33bbdip11u:3159_0: nanu brahmaśabdasya sādhāraṇatvāt taddhetuvyapadeśasya viṣṇuniṣṭhatayā spaṣṭapratibhānāt mantravarṇasamākhyāyāśca anyaliṅgādibhyo
GSP33bbdip11u:3159_1: durbalatvena sāvakāśatvāt ananyathāsiddhahetvantarasya cābhāvādānandamayādayo viriñcādaya eva santviti śaṅkāṃ pariharatsūtramavatārayati
GSP33bbdip11u:3164: / na viṣṇuriti na, kintu, viṣṇureva tairucyate /
GSP33bbdip11u:3166: kuto neti hetvākāṅkṣāyāṃ sūtramupanyasya pratijñāṃśasya na cetyādibhāṣyeṇaiva vyākhyātatvātsautramananyathāsiddhahetumeva vyācaṣṭe -
GSP33bbdip11u:3170: yadyapyayaṃ netara ityuktasādhye na hetuḥ/ tathāpi tasyānanyathāsiddhatvopapādakatvāddhetutvoktiḥ
GSP33bbdip11u:3171: asya hetuvākyasya adhyāhṛtahetuvākyadvārā na ceti pratijñayānvayaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:3173: ... sarvaṃ vai te 'nnamāpnuvanti (tai.u. 2-2-1.).... sarvameva ta āyuryanti'; (tai.u. 2-3-1.)
GSP33bbdip11u:3176: viṣṇujñānādeva mokṣo netarajñānādityetatkuta ityata āha - tamiti /
GSP33bbdip11u:3177: 'hi'; yasmāt 'tamevam'; iti śrutyā mokṣasya viṣṇujñānādanya upāyo nāstītyuktam /
GSP33bbdip11u:3183: atha so 'bhayaṃ gato bhavati'; (tai. 2-7.) 'sa yaścāyaṃ puruṣe'; (tai.
GSP33bbdip11u:3185: hetvantareṇa brahmādīnāmānandamayatvaṃ parākurvatsūtraṃ paṭhitvā vyācaṣṭe - bhedeti /
GSP33bbdip11u:3186: atra pūrvahetusamuccāyakena caśabdenānandamayādirnetara iti pratijñāvākyānuvṛtterapi sūcanāt
GSP33bbdip11u:3187: tadvihāya sūtroktaṃ bhedavyapadeśaṃ darśayati - te ye śatamiti // ādiśabdaḥ 'ānandāḥ'; ityataḥ paro 'pi yojyaḥ
GSP33bbdip11u:3188: / tatrādyena 'te ye śatam'; ityasya pūrvottarataittirīyavākyāni gṛhyante /
GSP33bbdip11u:3193: anena nānandamaya itaro viriñcaḥ, kutaḥ? bhedavyapadeśāt /
GSP33bbdip11u:3204: tatra 'prajāpatiḥ śivaḥ śepho liṅgamityabhidhīyate'; iti śaivapurāṇavacanāt 'prajāpateḥ'; rudrasya 'ye
GSP33bbdip11u:3205: śataṃ'; śataguṇitā ānandāḥ te 'brahmaṇaḥ'; caturmukhasya eka ānanda iti prathamavākyasyārthaḥ
GSP33bbdip11u:3206: 'adṛśye'; sākalyenājñeye 'anātmye'; ātmanaḥ ime ātmyāḥ jīvagīṇāḥ na vidyante ātmyāḥ yasmin so 'nātmyaḥ tasmin jīvaguṇavidhure /
GSP33bbdip11u:3207: athavā - ātmanaḥ svāmino 'yamātmyaḥ svāmisambandhī sa netyanātmyaḥ tasmin, svāmirahita iti yāvat /
GSP33bbdip11u:3210: tadviṣaye yo 'dhikārī 'abhayaṃ'; yathā bhavati tathā dhyānarūpāṃ
GSP33bbdip11u:3217: 'yaścāditye'; ādityapadopalakṣitotkṛṣṭajīveṣvasti 'saḥ'; ubhayatra sthito viṣṇuḥ 'ekaḥ'; abhinna iti tṛtīyabhedavyapadeśasyārthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:3225: tathāpi tena kathaṃ brahmādīnāṃ bhedaḥ sambhavati /
GSP33bbdip11u:3239: 'haṃ so 'sau yo 'sau so 'haṃ'; (ai.ā. 2-2-4.) 'yo 'sāvasau puruṣaḥ so 'hamasmi'; (ī. 26.) ityādiśrutirgṛhyate /
GSP33bbdip11u:3240: kuto netyatastatraitacchrutīnāṃ parabrahmārthakatvena advaitārthatvābhāvāditi hetūpaskāramabhipretya teṣāṃ parabrahmārthatve pramāṇamāha - nāmānīti /
GSP33bbdip11u:3243: tathā ca padasamanvayenaiteṣāṃ brahmaparatvānnaitadvirodha iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:3256: idaṃ hi viśvaṃ bhagavānivetaro yato jagatsthānanirodhasambhavaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:3259: tathāpi naikyaśrutivirodho bhedaśruteḥ śaṅkanīyaḥ, bhagavataḥ sarvaikyaśruteḥ sarvasvāmitvanimittaikyaparatvādityāśayena tatra pramāṇatvena
GSP33bbdip11u:3266: 'jagatsthānanirodhasambhavaḥ'; jagataḥ sthānaṃ sthitiḥ nirodho nāśaḥ sambhavaḥ utpattiḥ te yasmādbhavanti sa tathoktaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:3268: athavā - tiṣṭhatyasmāt niruddhyate pralīyate 'smin sambhāvayatīti sa tathoktaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:3270: evambhūtsya jagadbhedaḥ pramāṇasiddha iti jñāpanāya hiśabdaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:3271: tattvapradīpe tu - bahuvrīhiṃ vinā idaṃ viśvaṃ
GSP33bbdip11u:3280: bhagavān sarvabhinno 'pi sarvasvāmitvāt sarva ityabhedena vedādiṣūcyate ityarthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:3286: nanu bhedajñānasya mithyājñānatvātkathaṃ tadanusāreṇaikyaśrutayo yojyanta ityāśaṅkāṃ bhāgavatavākyena pariharati - vidyeti // idaṃ ca kā
GSP33bbdip11u:3291: na ca bhidāyā abodha iti vyākhyeyam, ajñānasya vidyātvābhāvāt /
GSP33bbdip11u:3292: nanu bhedajñānasya puruṣārthahetutvāt kathaṃ tasya vidyātvamityata āha - bhedeti /
GSP33bbdip11u:3296: iti pūrvavākyena kartṛtvātsaguṇaṃ brahma puruṣaṃ puruṣarṣabham /
GSP33bbdip11u:3302: manuṣyottamamārabhya garuḍaśeṣāntaiḥ jñānibhiryogasiddhaiḥ sanatkumārādyaiḥ saha 'bhedadṛṣṭyā'; jīveśvarādibhedajñānena 'abhimānena';
GSP33bbdip11u:3303: abhito harermānena parameśvare bahumānena āgraheṇa ca 'niḥsaṅgena
GSP33bbdip11u:3308: 'īśvaramūrtinā'; mūrtyā 'kāle'; sṛṣṭikāle 'jāte'; utpanne sati 'aguṇavyatikare'; sattvādiguṇavikriyāhīne viṣṇuloke 'yathāpūrvaṃ';
GSP33bbdip11u:3310: karmanirṇayaṭīkāyāṃ tu - na kevalaṃ saguṇaṃ, kintu, 'brahma'; purṇaṃ
GSP33bbdip11u:3316: abhimāneneti padaṃ abhito mānena viśeṣajñāneneti vyākhyāya,
GSP33bbdip11u:3317: 'guṇavyatikare'; iti padaṃ chitvā 'sa'; brahmādijīvasaṅghaḥ pralaye jñānaiśvaryādyanantaguṇaṃ brahma 'saṅgatya'; prāpya 'punaḥ kāle';
GSP33bbdip11u:3319: 'guṇavyatikare'; guṇānāṃ sattvādīnāṃ vyatikare vaiṣamye jāte sati
GSP33bbdip11u:3320: yathāpūrvaṃ jñānādiguṇatāratamyaṃ parasparabhedaṃ ca avihāya tadviśiṣṭa eva 'prajāyate'; prakarṣeṇa muktāvabhivyajyate /
GSP33bbdip11u:3321: na tu tadabhinno bhavatīti vyākhyātam/ ayaṃ padacchedaṣṭīkākṛto 'pi sammataḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:3327: atraivārthe atharvaṇavākyaṃ pramāṇayati - juṣṭamiti // juṣṭaṃ sarvasevyam īśaṃ svatantram
GSP33bbdip11u:3328: ata eva anyaṃ jīvādbhinnaṃ viṣṇum iti tadetatsatyam (mu.
GSP33bbdip11u:3329: 2-1-1-.) ityādinā prāguktaprakāreṇa asya mahimānaṃ ca yadā paśyati /
GSP33bbdip11u:3330: paśyo jīvaḥ tadā vītaśoko mukto bhavatītyarthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:3331: tattvapradīpe tu - juṣṭaṃ devaiḥ asya jīvasya īśam anyaṃ yadā paśyati mahimānaṃ mahimaguṇātmakaṃ tadā tadaiva vītaśoko bhavati na duḥkhaleśamapi spṛśati jīvaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:3332: na tu mahimaguṇavihīnam anyamanīśamasevitaṃ paśyan vītaśoko bhavatīti vyākhyātam
GSP33bbdip11u:3333_0: / yadyapīyaṃ śrutiḥ viśeṣaṇabhedavyapadeśābhyām (bra. sū. 1-2-22.) ityatra ayamanyomārga ityukte prasiddhamārgādanyatvabodhavat
GSP33bbdip11u:3333_1: anyamīśamityukte īśaśabditasya brahmaṇaḥ prasiddheśādrudrāt anyatvapratīterbrahmaṇo rudrādanyatve pramāṇatvenoktā /
GSP33bbdip11u:3334: na tu brahmaṇo jīvādanyatve, nāpi īśatvamanyatve hetūkṛtam /
GSP33bbdip11u:3338: 'asarvaḥ sarva ivātmaiva sannanātmeva pratyaṅparāṅivaika īyate bahudheyate'
GSP33bbdip11u:3340: evaṃ svāmitvārthatayā parābhimatādvaitaśrutīrvyākhyāya vākyasamanvayāśrayaṇena antaryāmitayāpi tāḥ śrutismṛtibhyāṃ vyācaṣṭe -
GSP33bbdip11u:3342: yadyapi asarvaḥ iti vākyam ātmaśabdasya svāmitvārthatvamupetya svāmitvena nimittenaikyaśrutayaḥ pravṛttā ityatra pramāṇatayodāhṛtam /
GSP33bbdip11u:3343: tathāpi svāmitvenevāntaryāmitayāpyaikyaśrutayaḥ pravṛttā ityubhayatrāpyasya pramāṇatvasambhavādubhayatrāpi pramāṇatayodāharaṇaṃ yuktam /
GSP33bbdip11u:3344: tattvapradīpakṛtāmapi svāmitvenevāntaryāmitayāpyaikyaśrutayaḥ pravṛttā ityubhayatrāpi asarvaḥ iti śrutiḥ pramāṇamityabhiprāyaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:3345: na caivaṃ tattadantaryāmitvenāpi tattacchabdavācyatvaṃ viṣṇorastītyāha - sarvāntaryāmikaḥ iti tattvapradīpavirodhaḥ; atra padasamanyavābhiprāyapratīteriti vācyam /
GSP33bbdip11u:3346: antaryāmitvenāpītyuktyā na kevalaṃ nāmāni iti śrutibalāttattacchabdapravṛttinimittatvena tattacchabdavācyatvaṃ
GSP33bbdip11u:3347: api tu antaryāmitvenāpītyetāvanmātrapratīteḥ atra padasamanvaye tātparyānavagamāt /
GSP33bbdip11u:3348: mahāvākyagatasyaitadādiśabdasyaikaikasya sarvāntaryāmikaḥ iti smṛtibalāt antaryāmitvanimittena viṣṇuvācitve 'pi
GSP33bbdip11u:3350: yadā nāmāni iti śrutibalāt kriyākārakādisarvārthavācisarvapadasya viṣṇuvācitvābhyupagamaḥ tadaiva padasamanvayaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:3351: na tvekaikasya viṣṇuvācitva iti na virodhaḥ tathā cāntaryāmitvanimittena tattvamasyādivākyagatatvamahamādipadānāṃ viṣṇuvācitve tvaṃ tvadantaryāmī tat brahma /
GSP33bbdip11u:3353: na caivami asi asmi iti kriyāpadānvayāyogaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:3356: yadyapi nimittakathanaprakaraṇe vidyātmani bhedadṛṣṭyā juṣṭaṃ yadā iti vākyatrayasyānvayābhāvaḥ
GSP33bbdip11u:3357: tathāpi svāmitvanimittenaikyavyapadeśa ityatra śrutismṛtyorupanyāne sati tatra prāptaśaṅkāparihārasyāvaśyakatvenāvasarasaṅgatyā tadvākyatrayapravṛtteḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:3358: ityādeḥ ityasāyatrākarṣaṇena na virodhaḥ ityasyānukarṣaṇena cānvayo draṣṭavyaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:3359: śrutyarthastu - viṣṇuḥ asarvo 'pi sarvanātmako 'pi sarva iva sarvātmaka iva sarvātmakatvena īyate /
GSP33bbdip11u:3362: ātmaiva antaryāmyeva san anātmeva anantaryāmitvena īyate jñāyate rāmakṛṣṇādirūpeṣu /
GSP33bbdip11u:3368: tathā ca bahirmātravṛttitvapratītirbhrāntiriti bhāvaḥ/ nanu viṣṇau viruddhānekadharmābhyupagame bhedāpattyā ekameva iti śrutivirodha ityata
GSP33bbdip11u:3373: tattvapradīpe tu - pratyaṅ parāṅiva abhimukho 'pyanabhimukha iva eka eva bahudheyate jñāyate
GSP33bbdip11u:3376: sarvajñaḥ? kva ca vyapadiśyata? ityata āha - sa puruṣa iti /
GSP33bbdip11u:3377: anena puruṣa evedaṃ sarvam (tai.ā. 3-12.) iti śrutimupādatte /
GSP33bbdip11u:3380: anena sarvaṃ khalvidaṃ brahma (chā. 3-14-1.) iti śrutimupādatte /
GSP33bbdip11u:3381: saḥ sarvātmakatvena vyapadiśyamāno bhagavān brahma sarvatra pūrṇatvādbrahmasaṃjña ityarthaḥ
GSP33bbdip11u:3382: nanvanyatrādṛṣṭamantargatasya bahirgatatvādikaṃ kathaṃ ghaṭata ityata āha - sa īśvara iti
GSP33bbdip11u:3383: saḥ hariḥ yataḥ īśvaraḥ acintyaśaktyupetaḥ atastasmin anyatrāghaṭitamapi sarvaṃ ghaṭata iti
GSP33bbdip11u:3385: eṣo 'haṃ tvamasau ceti na tu sarvasvarūpataḥ //
GSP33bbdip11u:3389: yadvā - yāmo niyamanaṃ tatra bhava ityarthe ṭhak, yato viṣṇuḥ sarvāntaryāmikaḥ
GSP33bbdip11u:3390: sarvāntarniyāmakaḥ ata eva eṣa ātmeti hovāca (chā. 8-3-4.) so 'hamasmi (ī.
GSP33bbdip11u:3391: 16.) tattvamasi (chā. 6-8-7.) yo 'sāvasau puruṣaḥ (ī. 16.) iti vākyasthena eṣo 'haṃtvamasāviti sarvanāmnā sarvavācakasarvanāmasaṃṅakaśabdena sarvamiti nāmnā cābhidhīyate /
GSP33bbdip11u:3394: mokṣadharme hi vaiśampāyanaṃ prati he brahman bhedavākyāt bahavaḥ puruṣāḥ pratipattavyāḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:3395: aikyavākyaṃ tu pradhānapuruṣaparamiti vā? utāho aikyavākyāt eka eva puruṣaḥ, dvaitavākyaṃ tu vyāvahārikabhedaparamiti?
GSP33bbdip11u:3396: tathā - puruṣabāhulyamupetyaikyavākyasya śreṣṭhaparatvapakṣe 'pi ātmasu kiṃ sarve samāḥ? utaikaḥ śreṣṭhaḥ? dvitīye ko 'sāvatra puruṣeṣu śreṣṭhaḥ?
GSP33bbdip11u:3397: sa kathaṃ hi śreṣṭhaḥ? taṃ tathā ca bhavān vaktumarhatītyāśayena kṛtasya
GSP33bbdip11u:3401: tathā taṃ puruṣaṃ viśvamākhyāsyāmi guṇādhikam // iti /
GSP33bbdip11u:3405: tathā ca vedāḥ ekameva puruṣaṃ vadantītyetanmataṃ jñānino necchantītyarthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:3407: puruṣaṃ necchanti, kintu bahavaḥ puruṣāḥ santīti /
GSP33bbdip11u:3411: bahūnāṃ kaḥ śreṣṭhaḥ? sa kathaṃ śreṣṭhaḥ?
GSP33bbdip11u:3413_0: he kurukulodvaha eteṣāṃ bahūnāṃ puruṣāṇām ātmānāṃ madhye yā yoniḥ yaḥ kāraṇabhūtaḥ ekā śreṣṭhaḥ yathā ca śreṣṭha ucyate śrutyādau
GSP33bbdip11u:3413_1: tathā tena prakāreṇa taṃ viśvaṃ pūrṇaṃ guṇādhikaṃ puruṣam ākhyāsyāmi vyākhyāsyāmīti prameyadīpikāvyāsatīrthīyadiśā smṛtyarthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:3415: tathā ca sarvotkṛṣṭaṃ yadekaṃ brahmatattvamasi tasmādatyavaro 'si atyavaro 'smīti śrutyartha ukto bhavati /
GSP33bbdip11u:3416: ityādeśca ityasya na ca tattvamasītyādivirodhaḥ ityanenānvayaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:3422: aprāptasya ca pratiṣedhāyogāt ityata āha - uktā ceti // caḥ sādhyasamuccaye /
GSP33bbdip11u:3423: co yato na ca tattvamasi ityādinā jīveśvaikyasya prāptiḥ śrutyarthāparijñānanimittā prasaktiruktā
GSP33bbdip11u:3425: nanvetacchrutīnāmavirodhakatve 'pi bhedaśruteḥ brahmaiva san brahmāpyeti iti śrutivirodhastu bhaviṣyati /
GSP33bbdip11u:3426: atra brahmaiveteyavakāreṇa jīvasyābrahmatāniṣedhena tadadhīnatvādinā nimittena abrahmabhūte brahmatvavyavahāra ityuktagaterasambhavādityata āha - brahmaiveti /
GSP33bbdip11u:3432: tathā ca yato brahmaiva san iti vākye śruto 'yamādyo brahmaśabdaḥ brahmāṇi jīvāḥ sarve 'pi iti śruterjīva eva, na parabrahmaṇi ata ityarthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:3434: tathā ca iti vākye śrutādyabrahmaśabdokto jīva eva, na parabrahmetyarthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:3435: tathā ca iti vākye śrutādyabrahmaśabdokto jīva eva, na parabrahmetyarthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:3436: tathā ca saḥ muktajīvo brahmaiva san jīva eva san jīvabhāvamavihāyaiva pralaye parabrahmāpnoti
GSP33bbdip11u:3437: apihitassan praviśatīti śrutyarthopapatteḥ noktabhedavyapadeśasyaitacchrutivarodha iti bhāvaḥ
GSP33bbdip11u:3441: prāpnoti paramaṃ brahma pralaye pralaye sadā / iti //
GSP33bbdip11u:3445: tathā ca muktāviti vācyaṃ, na tu pralaya iti /
GSP33bbdip11u:3448: nanu brahmaśabdasya parabrahmaṇyeva mukhyatvānna jīve 'sau yujyata ityata āha - upapadyata iti /
GSP33bbdip11u:3450: tathā ca brahmaśabdo yadyapi parabrahmaṇi mukhyaḥ,
GSP33bbdip11u:3451: tathāpi virodhe svīyapūrvottaravākyavirodhe prāmāṇāntaravirodhe vā sati jīve 'pyupapadyata ityarthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:3452: prakṛte ca brahmāpyeti ityuttarabhāvisvavākyena paramaṃ sāmyam iti pūrvavākyena bhedagrāhipratyakṣādinā ca virodho 'stīti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:3454: nanu tathāpi bhedavyapadeśasya vimuktaśca vimucyate (kaṭha. 2-5-1.) iti kaṭhaśrutivirodhaḥ
GSP33bbdip11u:3455: atra saṃsāre 'pi jīvasya muktatvoktyā tadanyathānupapattyā parabrahmatvāvagamāt ityata āha - pramādeti //
GSP33bbdip11u:3457: tathā ca api - jīvasya parabrahmatvābhāve 'pi vimuktatvaṃ vimuktatvavacanaṃ ca yujyate
GSP33bbdip11u:3458: na kevalaṃ brahmaśabda upapadyate iti cārthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:3459: katham? bandhasya svataḥkartṛtvabhoktṛtvābhimānarūpasya jīvagatasaṃsārasya pramādātmakatvāt pramādapadoktājñānamūlatvena tannimittapratītikatvenāsvābhāvikatvāt
GSP33bbdip11u:3464: ubhe satye kṣatriyādya pravṛtte moho mṛtyuḥ saṅgato yaṃ kavīnām /
GSP33bbdip11u:3465: pramādaṃ vai mṛtyumahaṃ bravīmi tathāpramādādamṛtatvaṃ bravīmi /
GSP33bbdip11u:3467: he kṣatriyādya mṛtyuḥ saṃsāra tadabhāvarūpāmṛtatvaṃ cetyubhe api satye eva pravṛtte /
GSP33bbdip11u:3469: tarhi mithyā syādityato netyāha - pramādaṃ vā iti /
GSP33bbdip11u:3470: ahaṃ mṛtyuṃ saṃsāraṃ pramādaṃ asvābhāvikaṃ bravīmi /
GSP33bbdip11u:3471: amṛtatvaṃ muktatvaṃ tu apramādāt pramādāpāyāt bravīmītyarthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:3479: nanu bhedokteḥ śrutivirodhābhāve 'pi jīvo brahmābhinnaḥ cetanatvāt
GSP33bbdip11u:3483: ityanumānavirodhastu bhaviṣyatītyata āha - na ceti // co 'virodhasamuccaye /
GSP33bbdip11u:3484: tathā ca na kevalaṃ śrutivirodhābhāvaḥ, kintu tasyāḥ bhedokteḥ
GSP33bbdip11u:3490: tatra hetvākāṅkṣāyāṃ sūtramupanyasya vyācaṣṭe - kāmāditi // 'hi'; yato
GSP33bbdip11u:3491: 'bhedasādhanāya paropanyastam 'anumānam'; anumānatvena parābhimataṃ 'pṛthak'; pratyakṣādiviruddhaṃ śrutisāhāyyarahitaṃ ca ataḥ 'tattve';
GSP33bbdip11u:3497: 'yathākāmaṃ'; yatheccham īśvaro na svatantraḥ cetanatvāt devadattavat /
GSP33bbdip11u:3498: jaḍa ātmā vastutvādityādirūpeṇa na tattve atattve 'pi anumātuṃ śakyate /
GSP33bbdip11u:3499: ataḥ anena pratyakṣādiviruddhasyāpi pramāṇatve cetanatvavastutvāderapi pramāṇatvaṃ syāt aviśeṣāditi vipakṣe bādhakatarka ukto bhavati /
GSP33bbdip11u:3501: 'kāmāt'; ityekadeśotkīrtanena yathākāmāditi samagraśabdo lakṣyate jyotiśśabdena jyotiṣṭomaśabdavat ityāśayena yathākāmamityuktam /
GSP33bbdip11u:3505: ityanena naño viruddhārthakatvamāśritya 'nānumā'; ityaikapadyaṃ ca sūcitam
GSP33bbdip11u:3507: smṛtyanusāreṇa sūtre bhāṣye ca tattvajñānāsādhanatvaprakaṭanāya parābhimatānumāne sādhanagocarecchāviṣayatvaniṣedhaḥ
GSP33bbdip11u:3510: tattvajñānārthaṃ 'nāpekṣā'; na apekṣā yasyāṃ sā tathāktā tattvajñānakāraṇaṃ na bhavati
GSP33bbdip11u:3513: tadviruddhāpi sadanumā kiṃ na syāt? na syāt /
GSP33bbdip11u:3516: tathā ca pratyakṣādiviruddhāyā api prāmāṇye uktarītyā atattvaviṣaye pravṛttāyā anumāyā api prāmāṇyaṃ syāt, aviśeṣāditi bhāvaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:3521: atraiva smṛtisammatimāha - uktaṃ ceti // caḥ samuccaye /
GSP33bbdip11u:3529: apavṛttaṃ viruddhaṃ gaṃ gamanaṃ yasyāḥ sā apagā, na apagā anapagā iti vigrahaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:3530: tathā ca yasmāt 'anumā'; śrutyādiviruddhaṃ pṛthaganumānaṃ 'yathākāmā'; kāmamanatikramya pravartate
GSP33bbdip11u:3532: śrutyanukūlā tadaviruddhaiva sā 'pūrvāparāvirodhāya'; śruteḥ pūrvottaravākyavirodhaparihārārtham 'iṣyate'; apakṣyate /
GSP33bbdip11u:3534: kvacidanyathā cet yatra śrutyādyānukūlyaṃ tadavirodhaḥ, pūrvottarāvirodhāya tattvaniścayāya ca kāraṇatayeṣyate /
GSP33bbdip11u:3537: yat sā anumā kevalānumā yathākāmā tasmāditi yojyam /
GSP33bbdip11u:3550: śuṣkatarkeṇa 'āneyā'; utpādyā 'apaneyā'; nirākāryā ca na bhavatītyarthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:3556: tathā ca iti kaṭhaśrutau coktamiti sambandhaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:3564: tathāpi saḥ vyāvahārikaḥ saṃsāra evāsti, na pāramārthiko muktāvapi /
GSP33bbdip11u:3568: asyānyasya ceti pratītinirāsāya caśabdaṃ vyākhyāti yuktīti /
GSP33bbdip11u:3574: tathā ca 'ityādi śāsti'; ityādinā śāstīti vānvayaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:3575: anena na kevalaṃ bhedavyapadeśādānandamayena jīvānāṃ bhedaḥ siddhaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:3579: ato na tadaikyaṃ jīvānāṃ nāpi sāṃsārika eva bhedaḥ /

GSP33bbdip11u:3707: ata eva pralayābdhiśāyitve 'āpo nārāḥ'; iti paścātpramāṇopanyāsaḥ śrutāvaṇḍakośaśabdaśravaṇe 'pi pratyayasya svārthikatvāttattyāgenāṇḍakośa ityevānūditam /
GSP33bbdip11u:3717: brahmā caturmukhaḥ 'svayaṃ'; svatantrāt hareḥ sākṣājjajñe ityarthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:3721: ato nārāḥ proktāḥ yena kāraṇena 'pūrvaṃ'; pralaye 'tāḥ'; āpaḥ tasya viṣṇoḥ ayanaṃ 'tena saḥ nārāyaṇaḥ smṛtaḥ'; tacchabdavācyatvena smṛtyukta ityarthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:3726: aṇḍaṃ praviṣṭo yo viṣṇuḥ so 'ṇḍaṃ bhittvā prakāśitaḥ /

GSP33bbdip11u:3734: itaśca brahmāṇḍajanakavīryatvaṃ pralayasthatvaṃ ca tasyaiva jñāyata ityāha
GSP33bbdip11u:3741: aheyaṃ ratiḥ śaṃ ca mitamasyeti raśmirjīvaḥ tamindayati prerayatīti raśmīt
GSP33bbdip11u:3742: jīvaprerakaṃ, inda preraṇe iti dhātoḥ ayaṃ dakārāntaḥ śabdaḥ /

GSP33bbdip11u:3746: jagatprakāśakaṃ 'puruṣaṃ'; pūrṇaṣaḍguṇaṃ nārāyaṇaṃ tadākhyaṃ brahma teja iti vā /

GSP33bbdip11u:3758: yadyevaṃ samudrasthatvādiliṅgādantasstho viṣṇuḥ, tarhi tenāntassthena viṣṇunā indrādīnāmabhedo 'tra vivakṣito 'stu /

GSP33bbdip11u:3771: kutaḥ? tasyendrādyantaryāmitvadantassthatvakathanena tebhyo bhedokteriti sūtrārtha ukto bhavati /
GSP33bbdip11u:3774: 'indro rājā'; ityādau tu indrādiśabdāḥ paramamukhyavṛttyā viṣṇuparā eva, bādhakābhāvāt /

GSP33bbdip11u:3779: 'brahmā'; caturmukhaḥ devānāṃ hṛdyayanāt sthiteḥ pravartanādvā hṛdayaṃ viṣṇum 'anvavindat'; apaśyaditi śrutyarthaḥ /

GSP33bbdip11u:3797: tasyaivānandamayatvaṃ sidhyati, na viṣṇoriti phalamuktaṃ bhavati /

GSP33bbdip11u:3826: tathā cetthaṃ yojanā-yadyapi 'asya lokasya'; iti chandogavākye bhūtākāśasya śrutyādibalādasti pratipādyatvasya prāptiḥ /

GSP33bbdip11u:3830: yata evaṃ talliṅgāt asau chandogaśrutyuktākāśo viṣṇureva, tata eva 'ko hi'; iti taittirīyavākye 'pyasāveva pratipādyata iti tasyaivānandamayatve heturukto na tu bhūtasya/
GSP33bbdip11u:3831: ato bhūtākāśasyānandamayatve heturuktaḥ, na tu viṣṇoriti na mantavyamiti /

GSP33bbdip11u:3864: jñāyata ityata āha-viṣṇoriti/ viṣṇorvīryāṇi 'kaṃ'; ko 'nu ko vā 'pravocam'; prāvocat /
GSP33bbdip11u:3868: 'pi na pravaktīti śrutyarthaḥ/ 'parovarīyān'; ityuktasarvottamatvasya viṣṇudharmatvaṃ kuta ityata āha - para iti /
GSP33bbdip11u:3872: tatrādyo 'viṣṇornu vīryagaṇanāṃ katamo 'rhatīha yaḥ parthivānyapi kavirvimame rajāṃsi'; iti smṛtigrāhī /
GSP33bbdip11u:3875: yadyapi śrutyanusārātsarvottamatve prathamaṃ pramāṇaṃ vaktavyaṃ na tu anantatve /
GSP33bbdip11u:3876: ata eva ṭīkāyāmādau sarvottamatvaṃ gṛhītam/ tathāpi anantatvasya sāvakāśatvaśaṅkāviṣayatvātprathamaṃ tatra pramāṇopanyāsaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:3882: uttaratrānvayo vā/ yadyapi 'anantaḥ'; iti śrutiḥ; vācakaśabdatvāt
GSP33bbdip11u:3887: nanvanantatvam 'anantākāśavatpaśyan'; ityākāśasyāpi smaryate, ataḥ sāvakāśatvātkathaṃ viṣṇoreva talliṅgamityataḥ smṛtimāha - ananta iti /
GSP33bbdip11u:3888: ānandeti luptavibhaktiko nirdeśaḥ/ viṣṇurevaiko mukhyatayā procyata iti sambandhaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:3891: iti brāhma ityasya tasyaiva talliṅgamityuktamiti pūrveṇānvayaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:3894: nanu śrutyā pūrvapakṣite kathaṃ liṅgena nirṇayaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:3895: liṅgasya śrutito durbalatvādityataḥ ākāśaśrutirviṣṇau sāvakāśeti śrutyā darśayati -
GSP33bbdip11u:3897: 'co'; yato 'nāmāni sarvāṇi'; iti vākyena viṣṇorākāśādisarvaśabdavācyatvamuktam, ato liṅgena śruterbādhayā nirṇayo yukta iti yojanā /
GSP33bbdip11u:3904: paścātsaṅgatyādikaṃ vaktavyamiti sūcayitumatra sūtramādāveva paṭhati - ata eveti /
GSP33bbdip11u:3905: tadvai tvaṃ prāṇo abhavaḥ mahān bhogaḥ prajāpateḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:3906: bhujaḥ kariṣyamāṇaḥ yaddevān prāṇayo nava (tai. ā. 3-14.)
GSP33bbdip11u:3908: viṣayavākyodāharṇapūrvakaṃ pūrvādhikaraṇena saṅgatiṃ viṣayasaṃśayau ca sūcayati - taditi // atra yattadorāvṛttiḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:3911: tathā ca he viṣṇo 'yat'; yasmāt 'prajāpateḥ'; hiraṇyagarbhasya tadupakṣitānāṃ sakalajīvānāṃ 'bhujaḥ'; bhogān yogyānandān 'kariṣyamāṇaḥ'; upalakṣaṇametat
GSP33bbdip11u:3915: yasmācca pāyuguhyaikyena navendriyābhimānino devān tvaṃ 'prāṇayaḥ'; aceṣṭayaḥ/
GSP33bbdip11u:3917: tasmāttvaṃ prāṇaḥ prāṇaśabdavācyo 'bhava iti siddhāntarītyā śrutyarthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:3921: 'paramānandatvaṃ'; pūrṇānandatvaparyavasitaṃ 'tadvai tvam'; iti vākye 'mahābhogaśabdena'; 'mahān bhogaḥ'; iti padadvayātmakavākyena ca
GSP33bbdip11u:3925: saḥ vāyuruta viṣṇuriti saṃśayaśca sūcito bhavati /
GSP33bbdip11u:3927: sayuktikaṃ pūrvapakṣaṃ darśayati - sa ceti // tacchabda āvartate /
GSP33bbdip11u:3932: tathā ca paramānandatvaṃ yasya prāṇasyoktaṃ saḥ 'prāṇaḥ'; tacchabdavācyo mukhyavāyureveti 'āpatati'; prāpnoti /
GSP33bbdip11u:3934: kutaḥ? prasiddheḥ prāṇaśruteḥ tasyāśca tasminvāyau prasiddhe rūḍhatvāt /
GSP33bbdip11u:3935_0: prāṇapadapravṛttinimittasya jīvanāḍihetutvasya ca śarīre sati mukhye jīvanādikaṃ sambhavati nāsatītyanvayavyatirekābhyāṃ
GSP33bbdip11u:3937: yato viṣṇureva prāṇaḥ, ata eva 'śrīśca te lakṣmīśca patnyau /
GSP33bbdip11u:3939: siddhāntayati - na ceti // evaṃ prāṇasya vāyutvaṃ ānandamayatvaṃ ca na
GSP33bbdip11u:3941: kuto naivamityāśaṅkāyāṃ tatra hetutayā sūtraṃ vyācaṣṭe - yata iti /
GSP33bbdip11u:3945: tathā ca yato 'yaṃ prāṇo viṣṇoreva ato
GSP33bbdip11u:3947: kuto 'yaṃ prāṇo viṣṇurevetyataḥ sautraṃ hetumanūdya vyācaṣṭe - ata eveti /
GSP33bbdip11u:3950: kathaṃ śrutyā pūrvapakṣite liṅgena nirṇaya ityato liṅgasya niravakāśatvajñāpanāyaivakāraḥ
GSP33bbdip11u:3951: tathā ca sāvakāśaśruterniravakāśaliṅgena bādha iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:3952: he viṣṇo 'te'; tava śrīśca lakṣmīśceti dve patnyau staḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:3970: sarvabuddhiniyantāraṃ jagatpatiṃ sarvasaṃhartāraṃ hariṃ devāḥ anugacchantītyarthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:3981: 'vi me karṇā patayato vicakṣurvī3daṃ jyotirhṛdaya āhitaṃ yat /
GSP33bbdip11u:3982: vi me manaścarati dūra ādhīḥ kiṃ svidvakṣyāmi kimu nūmaniṣye'
GSP33bbdip11u:3986: pūrvādhikaraṇatadviṣayasaṅgatī viṣayavākyodāharaṇapūrvakaṃ viṣayasaṃśayau ca darśayati - yo vedeti // tataḥ kimityata āha - tacceti /
GSP33bbdip11u:3993: jyotirviṣayaḥ kimagniruta viṣṇuriti sandehaśca sūcito bhavati /
GSP33bbdip11u:3997: ata eva sūtre caraṇābhidhānāt ityevoktam/ bhāṣye tu 'vicaraṇābhidhānāt'; iti spaṣṭārthamuktam
GSP33bbdip11u:4003: tathā ca yato me karṇau jyotiṣo viruddhaṃ patayataḥ patataḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:4009: tathā ca yadidaṃ hṛdaye 'āhitam'; ā samantāt sthitaṃ jyotistadatyantaṃ karṇādiviruddhaṃ vartate
GSP33bbdip11u:4010: evaṃ me manaḥ jyotiṣo dūre vicarati atīva taddarśanaviruddhaṃ vartate /
GSP33bbdip11u:4011: manaścaraṇasya tattvaniṣṭhāvirodhitvaṃ 'cañcalaṃ hi manaḥ kṛṣṇa'; iti gītāyāmuktam /
GSP33bbdip11u:4014: kimu kiṃ vā nu idānīṃ 'maniṣye'; cintayāmīti mantrārthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:4021: tathā ca tajjyotirguhānihitaṃ cāgnireva bhavediti prāptaṃ, kutaḥ? 'prasiddheḥ';
GSP33bbdip11u:4023: na kevalaṃ śruterevedaṃ jyotiragniḥ, kintu tasya jyotiṣaḥ 'agnisūktatvāt';
GSP33bbdip11u:4025: ata eva pūrvapakṣopasaṃhāraṭīkāyāṃ śrutiprakaraṇayorbalavatvāditi prasiddhapadalakṣitāyāḥ śruteḥ prathamamuktiḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:4026: ata eva candrikāyāṃ bhāṣye agnisūktasthatvācceti caśabdaprayogādityuktam /
GSP33bbdip11u:4027: tathā ca śrutiprakaraṇābhyāṃ guhānihitatvaliṅgamātrasya bādhāt agnirevedaṃ jyotirguhānihitaṃ ceti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:4032: siddhāntayatsūtramavatārayati - ata iti // yataḥ pūrvapakṣaḥ prāpto 'taḥ
GSP33bbdip11u:4035: sūtre tattvityasya anuvṛttiṃ vipariṇāmaṃ cābhipretya pratijñāṃśaṃ vyācaṣṭe - viṣṇureveti /
GSP33bbdip11u:4037: kuta ityataḥ prāptaṃ 'caraṇābhidhānāt'; iti hetvaṃśaṃ caraṇaśabdasya vicaraṇārthatvaṃ karṇādīnāmityasya adhyāhāraṃ cābhipretya vyācaṣṭe - karṇādīnāmiti /
GSP33bbdip11u:4039: atra karṇādividūratvaṃ nāma tairiyaditi paricchedāyogyavaibhavatvaṃ, na tu karṇādividūratvamātram
GSP33bbdip11u:4044: nanvastu jyotiṣaḥ karṇādividūratvoktiḥ, tāvatā tasya viṣṇutvaṃ kuta ityataḥ karṇādividūratvasya viṣṇvekaliṅgatve śrutimudāharan tatpratijānīte
GSP33bbdip11u:4047: tathā ca 'hi'; yasmāt 'saḥ'; viṣṇureva 'paro mātrayā'; ityādivākyena karṇādividūra iti pramitaḥ tasmānnāprayojakatā, na vā hetuviśeṣaṇāsiddhirityadhyāhāreṇa yojanā /
GSP33bbdip11u:4049: kutaḥ? atra karṇādīnāmetajjyotiḥ prati sākalyena tadaviṣayīkaraṇarūpaviruddha 'caraṇābhidhānāt';
GSP33bbdip11u:4051: māpayati jñāpayati viṣayāniti vā mīyante viṣayā aneneti vā mātrā indriyagaṇaḥ tayā tatastvaṃ 'paro'; dūro 'sīti he viṣṇo anyamahimnaḥ
GSP33bbdip11u:4052: paramantaṃ sīmānaṃ te mahimānaṃ ko 'pi śrotrādinā nāpeti ca
GSP33bbdip11u:4056: ṭīkākṛtastujyotissūtramekamadhikaraṇaṃ 'chandaḥ'; ityāditrisūtrī adhikaraṇāntaramiti jñātavyam // iti jyotiradhikaraṇam // 10 //
GSP33bbdip11u:4058: chando 'bhidhānān neti cen na tathā ceto'rpaṇanigadāt tathā hi darśanam |
GSP33bbdip11u:4060: saṅgatyādijijñāsājananāya sūtramevādau paṭhati - chanda iti // atra chanda ityāvartate
GSP33bbdip11u:4063_0: 'gāyatrī vā idam'; iti vākyasthagāyatrīśabdena caturviṃśatyakṣaramantraviśeṣātmakachandasaḥ pratipādanāt, tacchabdasya tatra
GSP33bbdip11u:4063_1: rūḍhatvāt, gāyatrīśabdavācyo na viṣṇuḥ, kintu chanda eva yato gāyatrī na viṣṇuḥ, api tu chandaḥ, ato jyotirapi na viṣṇuḥ
GSP33bbdip11u:4068: gāyatryādipadairviṣṇorevābhidhānaṃ ca tadabhedavidhānārthaṃ kintu tathopāsanārthamevetyāha - tatheti /
GSP33bbdip11u:4073: anena prasiddhagāyatryādipadena viṣṇorabhidhānaṃ vyarthamiti śaṅkā parihṛtā/
GSP33bbdip11u:4074: nanu bhavedgāyatrīśabdavācyatvena viṣṇorjyotiśśabdavācyatvasādhanam, yadi gāyatrīśabdavācyatvaṃ viṣṇoḥ pramitaṃ syāt /
GSP33bbdip11u:4078: yayeti vyupattyā 'gāyati ca trāyati ca'; (śākhāntaram) ityādirūpā śrutirasti tasmāditi sūtrārthaḥ
GSP33bbdip11u:4082: tasmānna viṣṇuriti cet - na, tathā cetor'paṇārthaṃ hi nigadyate /
GSP33bbdip11u:4084: śrutyādisaṅgativiṣayavākyaviṣayasaṃśayapūrvapakṣatatphalāni sūcayan sūtre pūrvapakṣāṃśaṃ vyācaṣṭe - atheti // uktasyetyāvartyate /
GSP33bbdip11u:4086: āhitaṃ yat'; iti guhānihitatvena yaduktaṃ tasyaiva 'jyotiṣaḥ'; punaḥ 'atha
GSP33bbdip11u:4087: yadataḥ paro divo jyotirdīpyate viśvataḥ pṛṣṭheṣu sarvataḥ pṛṣṭheṣu anuttameṣūttameṣu lokeṣu
GSP33bbdip11u:4092: vijñāyate? yato 'gāyatrī vā idaṃ sarvaṃ vāgvai gāyatrī vāgvā idaṃ sarvam';
GSP33bbdip11u:4095: tataḥ kimityata āha - tasmāditi/ idaṃ cāvartate /
GSP33bbdip11u:4098: tathā ca yasmādgāyatryā samārambhaḥ kṛtaḥ, sa ca yasmādanupasañjātavirodhitvena
GSP33bbdip11u:4100: sā ca gāyatrī virṇasamāveśalakṣaṇamantrātmakachanda eva bhavet, na viṣṇuḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:4103: anena 'gāyatrī vā idaṃ sarvam'; iti pūrvavākyasthagāyatrīśabdasya viṣṇvanyaparatve tata evottaravākyasthajyotiṣo viṣṇvanyatvāpattyā tata eva
GSP33bbdip11u:4105: ata evānandamayatvamapi anyasyaiva bhavenna viṣṇoriti pūrvoktākṣepeṇa etadadhikaraṇotthānātpūrveṇāsyākṣepikī saṅgatiḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:4109: bhavet; tacchabdasya tatra rūḍhatvāditi sayuktikaḥ pūrvapakṣaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:4110: tathā tasmāt jyotirapi chanda eveti tasyaiva guhānihitatvamāndamayatvaṃ ceti pūrvapakṣaphalaṃ ca sūcitaṃ bhavati /
GSP33bbdip11u:4112: mantraparāḥ, sarvamapi vākyaṃ tanmāhātmyaparatayā yojanīyam/ siddhānte tu 'atha'; ityāderayamarthaḥ - bhagavanmāhātmyāntarārambhe 'thaśabdaḥ 'yat';
GSP33bbdip11u:4113: śvetadvīpānantāsanavaikuṇṭhagataṃ nārāyaṇavāsudevavaikuṇṭhākhyaṃ rūpatrayaṃ tat 'ataḥ'; etasmādvivakṣitādbuddhisthāt 'divaḥ paraḥ'; paraṃ tadapekṣayoccasthānasthitamityarthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:4117: tṛtīyaṃ satyaloke ca sadanaṃ trividhaṃ matam //
GSP33bbdip11u:4118_1: krameṇocceṣu 'anuttameṣu'; na vidyate uttamo loko yebhyasteṣu pratyavareṣviti vā /
GSP33bbdip11u:4121: 'tat'; dīpyamānaṃ tejaḥ 'idaṃ vāva'; idaṃ khalu/ idaṃ ca kim?
GSP33bbdip11u:4123: yo gāyatrīnāmā gāyatrīsaṃsthaḥ strīrūpo hayaśīrṣākhyo bhagavān tadidaṃ prathamaṃ rūpamityāśayena tasya dvitīyaṃ rūpaṃ vaktuṃ gāyatrītyādivākyaṃ pravṛttam /
GSP33bbdip11u:4124: 'yadidaṃ kiñca bhūtaṃ'; pūrṇaṃ matsyādyavatārarūpaṃ yacca 'sarvaṃ'; sarvāntaḥsthitaṃ rūpaṃ
GSP33bbdip11u:4135: tathā ca jyotiḥśabdena viṣṇureva nigadyata ityarthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:4136: kuta ityato nigadāditi hetuṃ yojayati - hi nigadyata iti /
GSP33bbdip11u:4138: tathā ca 'hi'; yasmādgāyatrīśabdenāpi viṣṇureva 'nigadyate'; abhīdhīyate tasmādityarthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:4139: viṣṇorgāyatryādiśabdairabhidhānaṃ ca na tadabhedavidhānārthaṃ, kintu tathopāsanārthamevetyāha - tatheti /
GSP33bbdip11u:4143_0: atra jyotiśśabdopalakṣakāgnipadaṃ jyotissūtrasya bhinnādhikaraṇatvapakṣe anyatra prasiddhasya gāyatrīpadasya viṣṇau prayoge
GSP33bbdip11u:4143_1: prayojanamatra vadatā sūtrakṛtā pūrvatrottaratra cāgnyādipadasya viṣṇau prayoge prayojanaṃ sūcitamiti darśayitum /
GSP33bbdip11u:4144: na ca gāyatryādipadābhyāmeva gāyatrīpadasamanvayaphalasya pūrvatrottaratra coktasamanvayaphalasya ca sūcanasambhavādagnipadaṃ vyarthamiti vācyam /
GSP33bbdip11u:4148: jyotirityādicatuḥsūtryā ekādhikaraṇatvapakṣe tu sākṣātsamanvetavyapaśabdatvenaiva śabdadvayopādānaṃ, na tu phalatvenāgniśabdasyādhikaraṇāntare 'pyetannyāyasūcanaṃ tu ādiśabdenaiva,
GSP33bbdip11u:4151_0: ata eva tattvapradīpe ādiśabdasyobhayatrānvayaṃ prathamādiśabdena tejaḥśabdānāṃ dvitīyena chandaśśabdānāṃ ca grahaṇamabhipretya
GSP33bbdip11u:4151_1: 'agnyāditejaḥśabdānāṃ gāyatryādichandaśśabdānāṃ ca'; ityuktam / kecittu bhāṣyagatahiśabdo jñānārthamatha dhyānārthamiti pramāṇaprasiddhidyotakaḥ,
GSP33bbdip11u:4161: tathā hi darśanaṃ 'gāyati trāyati ca'; (chāṃ. 3-12-1.) ityādi /
GSP33bbdip11u:4162_0: nanu bhavedgāyatryādiśabdavācyatvena viṣṇorjyotiśśabdavācyatāsādhanaṃ yadīyaṃ gāyatrī viṣṇuḥ syāttadeva kuta ityato gānatrāṇakartṛtvaliṅgādityāśayena
GSP33bbdip11u:4162_1: tasyāsiddhiparihārāya pravṛttaṃ tathāhīti sūtraśeṣam anukṛtya darśanapadoktāṃ śrutiṃ darśayati - tatheti // 'hi'; yasmāt
GSP33bbdip11u:4164: yadyapi 'gāyati trāyate ca'; iti pāṭhaḥ chandogānam, tathāpi śākhāntaramevedamityadoṣaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:4165: ādipadena 'yā vai sā gāyatrī iyaṃ vāva sā yeyaṃ pṛthivyasyāṃ hīdaṃ sarvaṃ bhūtaṃ pratiṣṭhitametāmeva nātiśīyate'; (chāṃ. 3-12.2.) ityādikaṃ gṛhyate /
GSP33bbdip11u:4173: kathaṃ pṛthivī viṣṇurityataḥ tallakṣaṇayogādityāha - asyāṃ hīdamiti /
GSP33bbdip11u:4175: sudhāyāṃ tu pūrvapakṣānuguṇatayā gāyatrī 'gāyati'; arthaṃ pratipādayati, adhyetṛn
GSP33bbdip11u:4180_0: nanu gāyatryādiśabdasya anyatra rūḍhatvātkathaṃ liṅgamātreṇa viṣṇutvaniścaya ityato gāyatryādiśruteḥ sāvakāśatvāditi bhāvena
GSP33bbdip11u:4180_1: gāyatryagnipṛthivyādiśabdāḥ na kevalaṃ śrutyuktayogena viṣṇau sāvakāśāḥ,
GSP33bbdip11u:4181: api tu paurāṇikarūḍhyā gāyatryāḥ bhagavadadhīnatvādapītyāśayena tatra smṛtimāha - sarveti
GSP33bbdip11u:4188: kuta ityataḥ chanda ādīnāṃ bhagavadadhīnatvāditi pratyekaṃ hetutrayasūcanāya hiśabdatrayaṃ,
GSP33bbdip11u:4190: chandasāṃ lokānāṃ ca pratyakṣatvāt devānāṃ ca parokṣatvādeṣo 'sāviti vicitroktiḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:4191: kathaṃ tarhyanyatra vyavahāra ityata āha - teṣāmiti /
GSP33bbdip11u:4194_0: 'upacārato'; viṣṇusamīpe caraṇāttadadhīnatvādamukhyata evetyarthaḥ / vāmana ityasya 'hi'; yato vāmane iti 'darśanaṃ'; pratipādanamastyataḥ
GSP33bbdip11u:4194_1: śrutermukhyavṛtyā viṣṇāveva sāvakāśatvāt liṅgasyāmukhyato 'pyanyatrānavakāśatvāttena tadbādhopapatterbhavatyeva gānatrāṇakartṛtvaliṅgamātreṇāyaṃ
GSP33bbdip11u:4196: hetvantareṇāpi gāyatryāḥ viṣṇutvaṃ sādhayatsūtramupanyasya tadgṛhītāṃ śrutimudāharati - bhūtādīti/ itiśabdasya bhūtādītyanenānvayaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:4197: sūtre bhūtaṃ viśvamādiḥ prathamoddiṣṭaṃ yeṣu te bhūtādayaḥ, te pādāḥ yasya
GSP33bbdip11u:4198: gāyatrīpadārthasya sa bhūtādipādaḥ, tasya vyapadeśaḥ tatpratipādakaṃ
GSP33bbdip11u:4205: bhūtādiśabdagṛhītāmṛtākhyāṃśacatuṣṭavattvopadeśāt tasya ca viṣṇāvevopapatteranyatrānupapattereva gāyatrīśabdavācyo viṣṇureva bhavedityarthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:4206: caśabdasya vyapadeśapadenānvaye gāyatryā viṣṇutve sādhye pūrvasūtre darśanapadoktahetoḥ etatsūtroktahetudvayasya ca samuccaye saḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:4207: yathāśrutānvaye tu bhūtādipādatvasya viṣṇuliṅgatvaṃ na kevalaṃ viṣṇorevopapatteḥ siddham, kintu puruṣasūktoktatvācceti hetusamuccaye sa iti jñeyam /

GSP33bbdip11u:4229: 'tripāt'; trayāṇāṃ pādānām aṃśānāṃ samudāyo nārāyaṇavāsudevavaikuṇṭhasaṃjñaṃ triṣu rūḍhyā dyotamānatvācca dyuśabdavācyeṣu śvetadvīpānantāsanavaikuṇṭheṣu tiṣṭhatīti ṛcoktamityarthaḥ

GSP33bbdip11u:4254: kuta etat jñāyata ityata āha - suvarṇaṃ kośamiti /

GSP33bbdip11u:4270: ṣaḍindriyāṇi viṣayeṣu jīvena juhvato vā, ṣaḍindriyaiḥ sārādanakarturvā,

GSP33bbdip11u:4275: pādatvaṃ caturthabhāgasāmyaṃ 'na vivitse'; na lebhe kileti śrutyarthaḥ /

GSP33bbdip11u:4286: sūcitaṃ tasyāprayojakatvamāśaṅkya pariharati - sa hīti // 'hi'; yasmāt

GSP33bbdip11u:4293: catuṣpadetyuktagāyatrīcatuṣpādatvasya puruṣasūktamantreṇopapādanāt tatpratipādyatve tadupapādyagāyatrīśabdārthatāpi tasyaiva prāpnotīti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:4294: puruṣasūktoktasya viṣṇutvaṃ kuta ityata āha - yajñeneti /
GSP33bbdip11u:4300: yajñaśabdaḥ kathaṃ viṣṇutvaniścāyaka ityato vidvadrūḍhyetyāha - yajña iti /
GSP33bbdip11u:4301: 'hi'; yataḥ yajña iti padena viṣṇvākhyā devatācyata ityarthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:4311: na ca tata eva bhūtādipādatvasya viṣṇuliṅgatvaniścayaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:4315: puruṣasūktoktasya viṣṇutve smṛtiñcāha - tasminniti // mahārājeti kasyacitsambodhanaṃ rāmaviśeṣaṇaṃ vā /
GSP33bbdip11u:4317: tathā ca he mahārāja 'tasmin'; tretāyuge sarvaiḥ puruṣanāmabhī rāma evābhidhīyate ityarthaḥ
GSP33bbdip11u:4325: yathā kṛtsne pauruṣe sūkte viṣṇureva na tvanyaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:4327: anena siddhasyaiva dṛṣṭāntatvātpuruṣasūktasya viṣṇuparatvaṃ siddhamiti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:4330: upadeśabhedān neti cen nobhayasminn apy avirodhāt |

GSP33bbdip11u:4335_1: dvayorviṣṇvākhyam ekaṃ vastu pratipādyaṃ, kintu bhinnameveti cet - na,
GSP33bbdip11u:4338: trisaptalokāpekṣayā saptamīpañcamyoḥ ekārthatvena virodhābhāvāditi sūtrayojanāmabhiprayannākṣepāṃśaṃ tāvadvyācaṣṭe -
GSP33bbdip11u:4341: 'paścimaḥ'; paścāttanaḥ uttara upadeśastadbhinno 'stīti śeṣaḥ/ virodhasphoraṇāya pañcamyanta
GSP33bbdip11u:4345: yasmādevaṃ bhinnopadeśadvayamasti tasmādatropadeśadvaye gāyatrījyotiśśabdābhyāṃ naikaṃ vastu viṣṇvākhyamucyate /
GSP33bbdip11u:4351: / kiṃ tvitiśeṣaḥ, ekaṃ vastūcyate iti anuṣajyate /
GSP33bbdip11u:4354: tathā ca kintūbhayasmin apyupadeśe ekameva viṣṇvākhyaṃ vastūcyate iti yojanā /
GSP33bbdip11u:4358_0: ayaṃ bhāvaḥ - yadā bhūrbhuvassvariti lokatrayavivakṣā, tadā lakṣayojanocchritāntarikṣākhyabhuva uparitanasya sarvasyāpi dyutvāt
GSP33bbdip11u:4368: tadendrasadanasya dyutvāt taduccasyāpyuparisthitatvena tatsajātīyasyavaikuṇṭhasya divaḥ paratvam

GSP33bbdip11u:4371: iti smṛtermerorapi dyutvāttaduccasya bhūspṛṣṭatvena tatsajātīyasyānantāsanasyāpi divaḥ paratā
GSP33bbdip11u:4372_0: evaṃ sūryamaṇḍalasyāpi dyutvāttaduccasyoparisthatvena tatsajātīyasya bhūmeḥ kiñcidantaritasya sarvargasamonnatasya śvetadvīpasyāpi
GSP33bbdip11u:4372_1: divaḥ paratvamastīti na pañcamyantopadeśavirodho 'pīti dyuparatvaṃ ca sambhāvitasajātīyadyuparatvamiti na yāvattvayatkiñcittvamukhena
GSP33bbdip11u:4373: vaikuṇṭhasya svargalokātparatvenaiva divaḥ paratvasiddhāvapi tasya 'sarvataḥ pṛṣṭheṣu'; ityanenaiva uktatvāt svargatyāgenendrasadanasya dyutvoktiḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:4374: na ca lokatrayavivakṣayaivānantāsanādīnāmapi mervādiparatvena divaḥ paratvasyāpi siddheḥ saptalokavivakṣā vyartheti vācyam /
GSP33bbdip11u:4375: tathā sati vaikuṇṭhasyāpi dyuśabdārthaniviṣṭatvena tasya sarvadyuparatvāsiddhyāpatyā
GSP33bbdip11u:4381_1: yaugikaḥ, svargādau tu rūḍha iti upadeśayoravirodha iti prakārāntareṇa virodhaparihāraḥ kṛtaḥ // 11 //
GSP33bbdip11u:4385: tatra 'tā vā etāḥ śīrṣan chriyaḥ śritāścakṣuḥ śrotraṃ mano vākprāṇaḥ';
GSP33bbdip11u:4397: tathā ca 'tatra'; tadvai tvamiti vākye uktasya prāṇasya viṣṇutvaṃ na vidyate na yujyate /
GSP33bbdip11u:4398: kutaḥ? yatastatra 'tadvai tvam'; iti vākyoktaprāṇaviṣaye 'ukte'; śrute 'tā vā etāḥ'; ityaitareyavākye uktasya śrutasya prāṇasya viṣṇutvaṃ na vidyata iti yojanā /
GSP33bbdip11u:4399: kuto na vidyate ityata āha - indriyaissahābhidhānāditi /
GSP33bbdip11u:4407: 'tā vā etāḥ'; ityetacca caturmukhaśirasi śiraśśabdapravṛttinimittakathanāya pravṛttam /
GSP33bbdip11u:4409: tathā ca yataḥ 'tā etāḥ'; cakṣuḥ śrotraṃ manovākprāṇa
GSP33bbdip11u:4412: ata eva śrayaṇācchriya iti siddhānte śrutyarthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:4416: yataḥ pūrvapakṣaḥ prāptaḥ ata uttaraṃ sūtramāha bhagavān bādarāyaṇa ityarthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:4418: 'taṃ devāḥ prāṇayanta'; (ai.ā. 2-1-5.) 'sa eṣo 'suḥ sa eṣa prāṇaḥ'; (ai.ā.
GSP33bbdip11u:4421: sūtraṃ paṭhitvā tatrānugamāditi hetvaṃśaṃ śrutyudāharaṇena vyācaṣṭe -
GSP33bbdip11u:4425: ādipadena 'prāṇo hyevaiṣa ya eṣa tapati'; iti sūryamaṇḍalasthatvapratipādakavākyaṃ gṛhyate
GSP33bbdip11u:4427: bhūtānyāpipīlikābhyaḥ prāṇena bṛhatyā viṣṭabdhāni'; ityādi vākyaṃ ca
GSP33bbdip11u:4430: sautraṃ tathāśabdaṃ vyācaṣṭe - atrāpīti // śruta iti śeṣaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:4431: na kevalaṃ 'tadvai tvam'; ityatra, kintvaitareye 'pīti samuccaye 'piśabdaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:4434: 'tadvaitvam'; iti śrutyuktaprāṇo viṣṇuḥ tathaitareyokto 'pi viṣṇureva, na tvanyaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:4439: nārāyaṇaṃ vāyuṃ ca devāḥ 'prāṇayanta'; prakarṣeṇa śiṣyapraśiṣyadiṣu nītavantaḥ upadidiśurityarthaḥ
GSP33bbdip11u:4441: 'sa eṣo 'suḥ sa eṣa prāṇaḥ sa eṣa bhūtiḥ'; ityādyanyakhaṇḍagataṃ vākyam /
GSP33bbdip11u:4445: tatraiva 'tā vā etāḥ sarvā ṛcaḥ sarve vedāḥ sarve ghoṣā ekaiva vyāhṛtiḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:4446: prāṇa eva prāṇa ṛca ityeva vidyāt'; iti anyadvākyam /
GSP33bbdip11u:4451: kiñca ye sarve vedāḥ teṣāmapi prāṇa eva pratipādyaḥ/ api ca ye
GSP33bbdip11u:4453: tatra ṛcastu viśeṣata indrādināmavato viṣṇorguṇān alpajñānāmapi prakāśayantīti, prāṇe nārāyaṇe tadviṣayā eva 'vidyāt'; tatpratipādikā eveti jānīyādityarthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:4454: aitareyabhāṣye tu - prathamaprāṇapadamapi viṣayasaptamyantatayā vyāhṛtiśabdaṃ ca vyāharaṇaparatayā vyākhyāya ekameva vyāharaṇaṃ
GSP33bbdip11u:4457: atha devarathaḥ 'tasya vāguddhiḥ śrotre pakṣasī cakṣuṣī yukte manaḥ
GSP33bbdip11u:4458: saṅgṛhītā tadayaṃ prāṇo 'dhitiṣṭhati'; iti vākyāntaraṃ atra prāṇasya deharathatvamucyate /
GSP33bbdip11u:4460: ucyata iti śeṣaḥ/ tathā ca devasya viṣṇoḥ vāyoḥ adhyātmamadhidaivataṃ ca ratha ucyate ityarthaḥ
GSP33bbdip11u:4461: tasyādhyātmaṃ dehākhyarathasya 'vāk'; vāgākhyā umā uddhiḥ dhāraṇarajjurūpā adhidaivaṃ viṣṇurathasya prasiddhasyandanasya ca
GSP33bbdip11u:4468: tattvapradīparītyā bhinnapadatve 'pi taditi rathatayoktaṃ śarīraṃ parāmṛśyate /
GSP33bbdip11u:4471: liṅgena pūrvapakṣite kathaṃ tenaiva siddhānta ityāśaṅkānudayāya liṅgabāhulyoktiḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:4475: nanu bāhulyena balavataḥ saiddhāntikaliṅgādapi pūrvavādyuktaliṅgameva balavat /
GSP33bbdip11u:4483: ataḥ kathaṃ tairviṣṇutvaniścaya ityato devatopadeśyatvādiliṅgānāṃ niravakāśatvamapi smṛtyā
GSP33bbdip11u:4485: devāḥ viṣṇumeva prādhānyena śiṣyādiṣu jñānasampradāyapravartanena 'ānayan'; upādiśan /
GSP33bbdip11u:4488: tathā ca viṣṇuṃ bhūtiṃ bhūtirjñānādyaiśvaryarūpa ityupāsate ityarthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:4495: tathā caikaprakāreṇa prabalātpūrvapakṣiliṅgātprakāradvayenāpi prabalasya saiddhāntikaliṅgasyādhikyena nirṇayopapattiriti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:4500: yadā bahutvaniravakāśatvākhyaprakāradvayenāpi durbalaliṅgasyobhayathāprabalaliṅgato bādhasambhavena tainaiva prāṇasya
GSP33bbdip11u:4501_0: viṣṇutvasiddhiḥ, tadā kimu vācyaṃ niravakāśabrahmaśabdābhyāsāditi bhāvenānugamapadaṃ prakārāntareṇa vyācaṣṭe - brahmeti //
GSP33bbdip11u:4507: vāyuryatra sthita urveva garaṇaṃ stavanaṃ cakre tatsthānamudaraṃ tadgatamityarthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:4508: na vaktur ātmopadeśād iti ced adhyātmasaṃbandhabhūmā hy asmin |
GSP33bbdip11u:4510: padeśādindra eveti cet - na, 'prāṇastvaṃ prāṇaḥ sarvāṇi bhūtāni'
GSP33bbdip11u:4514: tathā ca prāṇo viṣṇuriti na yuktam /
GSP33bbdip11u:4521: uvāca ṛṣe priyaṃ vai me dhāmopāgāḥ varaṃ te dadāmīti /
GSP33bbdip11u:4523: tamindra uvāca'; iti pūrvavākyena saha vyākhyeyam/
GSP33bbdip11u:4525: kimiti? he ṛṣe me priyaṃ dhāmopāgāḥ prāpnuhi /
GSP33bbdip11u:4527: vaiśabdo 'vadhāraṇe prasiddhau vā/ evaṃ trivāraṃ śaṃsanena
GSP33bbdip11u:4528: dhāmaśabditasālokyaprāptibhagavatpuraprāptisādhanabhagavatprasādaṃ prāptaḥ 'saḥ'; viśvāmitraḥ indrāviṣṭena hariṇā varaṃ te dadānīti punaruktassan uvāca /
GSP33bbdip11u:4529: kimiti? tvāṃ sāmānyataḥ pūrvam ahaṃ jāne /
GSP33bbdip11u:4536: vihitānāmasmītyāditiṅantapadānāṃ tadvṛtteḥ sulabhatvāditi tattvanirṇayaṭīkārītyā ahamitīndrāntaḥsthena hariṇā svātmano nirdeśādasmīti uttamapuruṣopapattiḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:4545: tathā cetthaṃ tattvapradīpaṭīkoktā yojanā - nāyaṃ prāṇa indraḥ, kintu viṣṇureva /
GSP33bbdip11u:4548: tathā satyupadeśavirodha iti cet - na, kutaḥ? yato 'tra prakaraṇe svasthitasyaiva prathamaṃ 'prāṇo vā
GSP33bbdip11u:4551: yato 'tra tasyaiva prāṇākhyaparamātmanaḥ 'prāṇastvaṃ prāṇaḥ sarvāṇi bhūtāni'; ityevamādivākyena
GSP33bbdip11u:4552: indrādijīvarūpabahudehasambandhaḥ sarvagatatvameva ṛṣiṃ prati indreṇoktaṃ 'vidyate'; asti natvaikyamata iti /
GSP33bbdip11u:4556: athavā - adhikaścāsāvātmā cādhyātmā tasya sambandhaḥ bahuścāsāvadhyātmasambandhaśceti vigrahaḥ
GSP33bbdip11u:4557: tathā ca 'hi'; yataḥ 'atra'; indre 'bahuḥ'; bahulaḥ paramātmasambandhaḥ sannidhiviśeṣo vidyata ityarthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:4558: vidyata ityanantaraṃ tadapekṣayāyam upadeśo na svāpekṣayeti śeṣaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:4559: tathācendre tātkālikeśvarasannidhānaviśeṣābhiprāyā 'prāṇo vā aham'; ityuktiḥ, na svāpekṣayeti nopadeśavirodha iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:4561_0: yojanā tu - hi yasmāt 'prāṇastvam'; ityādi vākyenāsya prāṇasya 'bahvadhyātmasambandhaḥ'; adhyātmatvenāntaryāmitvena indrādirūpabahudehasambandhaḥ
GSP33bbdip11u:4566: anena bṛhatīsahasravakturviśvāmitrasya taṃ pratīndreṇa prāṇatayātmopadeśādayaṃ prāṇo na viṣṇuḥ, kintu indra eveti cet - nendro 'yaṃ prāṇaḥ, kintu viṣṇureva /
GSP33bbdip11u:4573: adhiścāsau ātmā ceti dehaḥ paramātmā cocyate /
GSP33bbdip11u:4574: tathā ca yasmādadhyātmano viṣṇorindraviśvāmitrādidehasambandha ukto 'sti tasmāt /
GSP33bbdip11u:4575: athavā - hi yasmāt asminnindre adhyātmasambandhabhūmā - adhirīśvare -
GSP33bbdip11u:4576: adhikasyātmanaḥ paramātmanaḥ sambandhasyāveśasya bhūmā bāhulyaṃ vidyate tasmādupadeśasya sannihitaparamātmaviṣayatvopapteriti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:4578: kutaḥ? hi yasmāt asmin prakaraṇe 'dhyātmasambandhabhūmoktaḥ tasmāditi sūtrārtha ukto bhavati
GSP33bbdip11u:4581: nanu yadi prāṇaśabdenendreṇāpi viṣṇureva svātmādisarvagatatayocyate tarhi mayi prāṇa iti nirdeśaḥ syāt /
GSP33bbdip11u:4586: tathā ca yato 'pi prāṇasya viṣṇutve 'pyupadeśaḥ prāṇo vāham ityevaṃrūpo yujyate, ato na tadanupapattiḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:4595: tathā ayamapyupadeśo yujyate ata iti sūtrayojanāmabhiprayan sautraśāstrapadaṃ vyācaṣṭe - śāstramiti
GSP33bbdip11u:4599: yadvā - śāsti prerayati sarvāniti vyutapattyā antaryāmītyetadeva śāstramityasya
GSP33bbdip11u:4602_0: śāstraśabdaprayogaḥ / aitareyabhāṣye 'śāsturantaryāmiṇaḥ'; iti śāstṛśabdaṃ mūlīkṛtya vyākhyāne 'pi, tadanusāreṇa ca tattvapradīpe
GSP33bbdip11u:4602_1: śāsturantaryāmiṇo viṣṇoriti vyākhyānepi nāsya tadvirodhaḥ śaṅkyaḥ,
GSP33bbdip11u:4603: yatastatparyāyaśabdavyākhyānenaiva śāstraśabdo vyākhyāto bhavatītyāśayena śāstraśabdaparyāyaśāstṛśabdo vyākhyāyate /
GSP33bbdip11u:4605: ityavayavavibhāgamabhipretya śāstrityaṃśasyāntaryāmiṇa ityanena aśabdasya viṣṇorityanena ca vyākhyātattvāt, atra tu avayavavibhāgamavivakṣitvā
GSP33bbdip11u:4615: agrahaḥ jāgratsvapnaviṣayajñānarahitā śayyā suṣuptiḥ nāmarūpakriyāsu śabdārthakarmasu vṛttirvyāvṛttiryanyāḥ sā /
GSP33bbdip11u:4617: āhatyaitadavasthātrayaṃ yasmādātmanaḥ parabrahmaṇo bhavati, tatsaṃvit sarvaviṣayaka-
GSP33bbdip11u:4619: śāstraṃ sarvaniyantṛ, paraṃ uttamaṃ padaṃ sadbhiḥ prāpyaṃ brahma aham acintayamiti /
GSP33bbdip11u:4625: nanvantaryāmiṇi ahamādiprayogaḥ kathaṃ sambhavatītyāśaṅkyāṃ tatra tuśabdasūcitāṃ smṛtimevāha - tattaditi/ viṣṇuḥ 'tattannātmā';
GSP33bbdip11u:4632: antaryāmiṇaṃ viṣṇuṃ 'ṛte'; vinā, anyatra 'kvāpi'; jīvādau 'kiṃ cit';
GSP33bbdip11u:4634: anena harau paramamukhyatā anyatra kevalamukhyatā coktā /
GSP33bbdip11u:4636: atrāhamādiśabdāḥ pratyagādivācitvena prasiddhāḥ, pratyagādayaśca sarvadā piṇḍībhūtāḥ, tānavivekenājñāḥ kevalajīvādau prayuñjate dahati śabdamiva kāṣṭhe /
GSP33bbdip11u:4637: prājñāstu mukhyāmukhyavivekavanto hyamukhmarthamanādṛtya mukhyārthe harau prayuñjataiti tattvanirṇaṭīkoktamanusandheyam
GSP33bbdip11u:4639: ityanantaram 'antaryāmiṇyahamādipadānāṃ mukhyatvokteḥ śāstradṛṣṭyā ahamādyupadeśo yukta eva'; iti vākyaśeṣaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:4641: nanvantaryāmiṇi ahamādiprayogādarśanāt tadayoga ityāśaṅkāṃ sūtroktadṛṣṭāntavivaraṇena pariharati - ahamiti // 'ahaṃ';
GSP33bbdip11u:4647: jīvamukhyaprāṇaliṅgān neti cen nopāsātraividhyādāśritatvād iha tadyogāt |
GSP33bbdip11u:4649: iti jīvaliṅgaṃ prāṇasaṃvādādimukhyaprāṇaliṅgaṃ tasmāt neti cet -
GSP33bbdip11u:4652: saṃvādo vivādaḥ kalahaḥ prāṇasya prāṇaissaha saṃvāda iti vigrahaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:4653_0: tathā ca yasmādatra prakaraṇe 'taṃ śataṃ varṣāṇyabhyārcat tasmācchataṃ varṣāṇi puruṣāyuṣo bhavanti'; (ai.ā. 2-2-1.) ityanena
GSP33bbdip11u:4654: śatāyuṣṭvarūpaṃ jīvaliṅgamuktaṃ tat 'tāvanti śatasaṃvatsarasyāhnāṃ sahasrāṇi bhavanti'; ityādinā bahuṣu sthaleṣu anusandhīyate /
GSP33bbdip11u:4658_0: yasmāccādipadagṛhītaṃ 'prāṇo vaṃśa iti sthaviraḥ śākalyastadyathā śālāvaṃśe sarve 'nye vaṃśāḥ samāhitāssyuḥ evamasmin prāṇe
GSP33bbdip11u:4658_1: cakṣuśśrotraṃ mano vāgindriyāṇi śarīraṃ sarva ātmā samāhitaḥ'; (ai.ā. 3-2-1-1.) iti vākyena sarvajīvendriyadehadhārakatvarūpaliṅgaṃ
GSP33bbdip11u:4658_2: coktamasti tasmādayaṃ prāṇo na viṣṇuḥ, kintu jīvamukhyaprāṇāveveti yojanā /
GSP33bbdip11u:4662: tathāpi liṅgasya bahuṣu sthaleṣu anugamo 'stīti jñāpanāyopaniṣado jīvaliṅge tātparyamastīti jñāpayitum anusandhivākyamevodāhṛtam /
GSP33bbdip11u:4665: kiyanti? bṛhatīsahasragatākṣarāṇāṃ vācyāni puṃrūpāṇi yāvanti sahasrāṇi tāvanti /
GSP33bbdip11u:4666: tathā ca tāni ṣaṭtriṃśatsahasrāṇi sampannāni bhavanti
GSP33bbdip11u:4670: parihārāṃśaṃ vyācaṣṭe - neti // prāṇo viṣṇurneti na, kintu viṣṇurevāyaṃ,
GSP33bbdip11u:4672_0: kuto netyatastatra prāguktānugamahetvanuṣaṅgaṃ, na coktajīvamukhyaprāṇaliṅgavirodha ityatastatrahetutvena yataḥ śāstradṛṣṭyā
GSP33bbdip11u:4672_1: tvayamupadeśaḥ ityasyānuṣaṅgaṃ, kimarthamantaryāmīti praśnasyāntarupāstyarthamiti parihāraṃ cābhipretya na copāsane
GSP33bbdip11u:4673: 'vāntarabhedābhāva iti codyottaratvena pravṛttam 'upāsā'; iti sūtrāṃśaṃ vyācaṣṭe - antariti
GSP33bbdip11u:4676: tathā ca dehāntargatatvena tadbahirgatatvena sarvagatatveneti prakāreṇa 'upāsātraividhyāt';
GSP33bbdip11u:4677: bhagavadupāsanasya trividhatvādityarthaḥ/ nanu tathāpi kathanaṃ vyarthaṃ vastuta upāsanātraividhyasyehānuktasyāntaryāmikathanāprayojakatvādityataḥ
GSP33bbdip11u:4687: atropāsanātraividhyamucyata ityatrāpi kiṃ liṅgamityata āha - sa iti /
GSP33bbdip11u:4691: anena bhagavato dehāntaḥpraveśokteḥ ukteścopāsanārthatvāt antarupāstiruktā bhavati /
GSP33bbdip11u:4696: tathā ca tatamaṃ atiśayena vyāptaṃ niravadhikavyāptimantaṃ 'brahma'
GSP33bbdip11u:4702: jānannaitareyaḥ itarāyā apatyaṃ pumān viśālasaṃjñāt ṛṣeḥ utpannaḥ aitareyaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:4703: 'mahidāso'; mahino mahātmāno devāḥ dāsabhūtāḥ yasyāsau bhagavānāhetyarthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:4705: atra bahirupāstyarthaṃ mahidāsa āheti bahirupāstiruktā bhavati /
GSP33bbdip11u:4713: asyāḥ upaniṣadaḥ aitareyasaṃjñayaivetarāputrasya mahidāsasya ṛṣitvasiddhyā taduktervyarthatvāt
GSP33bbdip11u:4717: tathāpi mahidāsasya viṣṇutvaṃ kuto jñāyata ityata āha - mahidāseti //
GSP33bbdip11u:4722: iti chāndogyabhāṣye anantaroktabhagavadanyaḥ tatsaṃjñaketarāputraḥ ṛṣiratra na vivakṣitaḥ, kintu /
GSP33bbdip11u:4727: pūrṇajñānādimān 'viṣṇuḥ'; tadavatārabhūtaḥ pūrvoktaḥ sa evātra vivakṣita ityāha - sākṣāditi/ brahmāṇḍe purāṇa ityasyāśritatvādityanenānvayaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:4731: nanvekavidhopāsanayā sarveṣāṃ brahmāparokṣasambhavātkimupāsātraividhyena ityataḥ pravṛttaṃ 'tadyogāt'; iti sūtraśeṣaṃ vyācaṣṭe - tattaditi //
GSP33bbdip11u:4734_0: tathā ca teṣāṃ puruṣāṇāṃ manuṣyarṣigandharvadevākhyādhikāriṇāṃ teṣu trividhopāsaneṣu madhye tattadupāsane yathākramaṃ bahirantarvyāptirūpaikaikopāsana
GSP33bbdip11u:4735: tathā cānekavidhopāstiyogyatāvatāmadhikāriṇāṃ naikavidhopāsanayā brahmajñānamiti tattraividhyamāvaśyakamiti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:4739_0: puruṣāṇāmuktānekavidhopāsanayogyatā kuto jñāyata ityataḥ kartṛviśeṣānanupādāya sāmānyataḥ upāsakatraividhyapratipādikāṃ smṛtiṃ
GSP33bbdip11u:4739_1: paṭhati - keṣāñciditi // 'puruṣottamo'; hariḥ 'keṣāñcit'; devānāṃ devaiḥ sarvagatatvena prakāreṇopāsyaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:4745: iti brāhma ityasya tattadupāsanayogyatayā tadviśiṣṭatvena puruṣāṇāmāśritatvāduktatvāditi pūrveṇānvayaḥ
GSP33bbdip11u:4757: 'viditātmanāṃ'; viśeṣato jñātabhagavadrūpāṇām aśrutapratibhānāṃ devānāṃ tu 'sarvatra'; sarvasthāneṣūpāsya ityarthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:4767: agnāviti vākye 'nyaniṣedhābhāvena bimbaśabditasvasvayogyātmāparokṣārthaṃ hṛdyupāsanasyāpi sarvaiḥ kāryatvābhyupagamāt /
GSP33bbdip11u:4768: mocakayogyāparokṣadvārābhūtāvatārādyaparokṣasādhanopāsanāya eva taistaiḥ prācuryeṇa prakaraṇasyāgnāviti vākyena vyavasthayā pratipādanācca /
GSP33bbdip11u:4773: ato na tadyogāditi hetvasiddhiḥ śaṅkyeti bhāva /
GSP33bbdip11u:4777: śatāyuṣṭvarūpajīvaliṅgasyaprāṇasaṃvādādirūpamukhyaprāṇaliṅgasya ceha śravaṇāditi cet - na, viṣṇurevāyaṃ prāṇaḥ, na jīvādiḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:4790: na caikavidhopāsanayā sarveṣāṃ brahmāparokṣasambhavāt kimupāsātraividhyeneti vācyam /
GSP33bbdip11u:4791: 'tadyogāt'; teṣāṃ puruṣāṇāṃ tasmin tadupāsana eva yogyatvāt /
GSP33bbdip11u:4792: anekavidhopāstiyogyatāvatāṃ ca puruṣāṇāṃ ekavidhapāsanayāparokṣāsambhavena yogyatābhedādupāsātraividhyasyāvaśyakatvāditi sūtrārtha ukto bhavati /
GSP33bbdip11u:4793: na ca vivādakartṛtvaliṅgasyāntaryāmiviṣayatve 'udāsīnau ca tāvāstāṃ keśavaścābjasambhavaḥ'; iti vacanavirodhaḥ śaṅkyaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:4797: viṣṇurevāyaṃ prāṇaḥ ānandamayaśceti yuktā tajjijñāseti siddham /
GSP33bbdip11u:4799_0: iti śrīmatparamahaṃsaparivrājakācāryāṇāṃ sarvatantrasvatantrāṇāṃ śrīmadraghunāthatīrthapūjyapādānāṃ śiṣyeṇa śrīmajjagannāthayatinā
GSP33bbdip11u:4802: cakre vedataroḥ śākhā dṛṣṭvā puṃso 'lpamedhasaḥ // śrīmadbhāgavatam,
GSP33bbdip11u:4803: 1. taduktam īśāvāsyabhāṣyaṭīkāyāṃ - 'brahmādīnām aprāptajñānamutpadyate śriyastu sarvadā vidyata iti vivekaḥ'; iti/
